40016007	Kila baleekelwa barakikha khukanikhanamo bonyene bari, “Walomele aryo lwekhuba khwebiliile khureerayo kimikaati.”
40016008	Ne Yesu nga wamanyile byoosi byeesi baaba baloma, kila abareeba ari, “Inywe babaali ni khufukiilila khukyeekhe, lwashiina mwireebana mwenyene muri, simuli ni kimikaati?
40016009	Mushiili khumanya ta? Simushebulila kimikaati kiraano kyeesi nawa babandu bikana biraano, bibiipo byeenga byeesi mwabuusanisa?
40016010	Ni kimikaati musaafu kyeesi nawa babandu bikana bine, bibiipo byeenga byeesi mwabuusanisa?
40016011	Shiina shishibalobeele khumanya muri, ise simbeele inganikha khu mikaati ta? Ne nimwiliinde kamamela ke Bafarisaayo ni Basadukaayo.”
40016012	Baryo nio lwanyuma bamanya bari, Yesu s'aba nga abalomela khukhwiiliinda kamamela kakaraambisibwa mu mikaati ta, ne isi khuleekela khwe Bafarisaayo ni Basadukaayo.
40016013	Lwanyuma nga Yesu wolile mu shaalo she Kayisaliya Filipi, wareeba baleekelwa beewe ari, “Umwana w'Omundu babandu bamulomakho khuuba naanu?”
40016014	Nabo bamwiilamo bari, “Balala baloma bari, iwe niye Yohana Umubatisa, babandi bari iwe niye Eliya, ni babaandi bari iwe niye Yeremiya, namwe mutweela khu baŋoosi.”
40016015	Naye Yesu wabaloma ari, “Ne inywe, ise munaanga khuuba naanu?”
40016016	Simoni Petero wamwiilamo ari, “Iwe uli Kristo, Umwana wa Wele Umulamu.”
40016017	Yesu wamwiilamo ari, “Simoni, mwana wa Yona, iwe uli n'ikhabi, lwekhuba mbaawo umundu ukhubimbuliile shino ta, ne Papa wase uli mwikulu.
40016018	Lundi ikhuloma ndi, iwe uli Petero, ni khu lwanda khuno kane nombekhekho Lisaayilo lyase, ni kamaani ke makoombe shikalilinyala ta.
40016019	Indikhuwa bifuungo bye Buyinga bwe mwikulu, shoosi sheesi ubowa khu shibala shilibowebwa ni mwikulu, ni neesho sheesi ukangulula khu shibala, shilikangululiwa ni mwikulu.”
40016020	Lwanyuma Yesu wakhonyakilila baleekelwa beewe balekhe khuboolelakho umundu yeesi bari niye Kristo ta.
40016021	Khukhwama khu saawa iyo, Yesu warakikha khukhwokesanisa baleekelwa beewe mu lubuula ari, niye shimwakhila khuutsya i Yerusalemu, ataambisiwe bibindu bikali, mu mikhono kye basakhulu, basaayi bakhulu, ni baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa, eribwe, ne lwanyuma khu shifukhu she khataru, alamusiwe.
40016022	Petero wamuyila andulo wamuloma ari, “Taawe Umukasya, Wele s'anyala walekha shino shakhukholikha khwiiwe shiryo ta.”
40016023	Yesu washuukha waloma Petero ari, “Yiila inyuma wase Sitaani, iwe uli shishituyisa isi ise, lwekhuba siwambaasa bya Wele ta, ne ili isaambo yeesi babandu bambaasamo.”
40016024	Lwanyuma Yesu waloma baleekelwa beewe ari, “Noola umundu yeesi akana khukhunondelela, eyikaane umweene, etyuukhe kumusalaba kweewe anondekho.
40016025	Lwekhuba buli mundu yeesi ukana khuwonesa bulamu bweewe, alibukosa, ne buli uyo yeesi ukosa bulamu bweewe khulwase, alibuwonesa.
40016026	Lwekhuba umundu shilimuyeeta shiina khuulya shibala shoosi, ne wafwiila bulamu bweewe? Namwe umundu aliwaanayo shiina nio bulamu bweewe bumukobosewele?
40016027	Lwekhuba Umwana w'Omundu aliitsila mu shiriifwa sha Papa we ni bamalayika beewe, nio lwanyuma awe buli mundu khukhwimikha khu buraambi bweewe ni buli.
40016028	Ilala imbaboolela ndi, iliwo batweela khuubo babemikhile ano babakhalifwa ta, khukhwolesa ni balibona Umwana w'Omundu nga etsila mu Buyinga bweewe.”
40017001	Lwanyuma lwe bifukhu bisesaba, Yesu watsya ni Petero, Yakobo, ni wandaaye Yohana, baniina khu lukiingi luleeyi, nga bali bonyene.
40017002	Ibweene iyo Yesu wakalusibwa shifwani sheewe nga bamubona. Mu moni mweewe mwamweekhamweekha nga inyaanga, ni bikwaaro byeewe byakhosa nga buwaanga.
40017003	Ni mu saawa nyene iyo, Musa ni Eliya bababonekhela nga bakanikha ni Yesu.
40017004	Petero waloma Yesu ari, “Umukasya, nga shilayi ifwe khuuba nga khuli ano. Noola wakanile, kane noombakhe ano bisari bitaru; shitweela shishoowo, shishiindi sha Musa, ni shishiindi sha Eliya.”
40017005	Ne n'aba nga ashikanikha aryo, namufweeli umweekhamweekha wabafusaasa, ni likono lyaama mu namufweeli nga liloma liri, “Uyu niye Umwana wase, yeesi nikhoyela naabi. Ni mumuwuliliise.”
40017006	Baleekelwa ni bawulila likono ilyo, baakwa asi befumalikha, nga bariire naabi.
40017007	Ne Yesu weetsa, wabawambakho, wabaloma ari, “Ni mwinyukhe, mukharya ta.”
40017008	Baryo ni benyusa tsimoni tsaawe, balekha khubonakho umundu ukuundi yeesi ta, akhali Yesu yenyene.
40017009	Ne ni baaba nga beekha khukhwama khu lukiingi, Yesu wabakhonyakilila ari, “Mukhaboolelakho umundu yeesi khu khubonesebwa khuno ta, khukhwolesa Umwana w'Omundu nga walamusibwile khukhwama mu bafu.”
40017010	Baleekelwa bamureeba bari, “Lwashiina baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa baloma bari, Eliya niye uwakhila khunyoowa khukhwiitsa?”
40017011	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Ilala Eliya niye ulinyoowa khukhwiitsa, aliŋoonaŋoona bibindu byoosi.
40017012	Ne mbaboolela ndi, Eliya wamala khaale khukhwiitsa, ne sibamwofwasa ta, bamukhola shoosi sheesi bakana. Aryo n'Umwana w'Omundu musaambo nyeneyo alitaambisibwila mu mikhono kyaawe.”
40017013	Ulwo baleekelwa bamanya bari, aba akanikha isi bali bibiwaamba khu Yohana Umubatisa.
40017014	Nga boolele isi lituuli lye babandu, umusaani mutweela weetsa isi Yesu, wafukhamila asi is'ali.
40017015	Waloma ari, “Umukasya n'uwambile umusiinde wase shiisa. Akwaka tsifubu, nalundi tsimutaambisa naabi. Tsifuunda ngali, tsimukwiisa mu mulilo, ni mu mbuka ikiindi lukanile mu meetsi.
40017016	Imureerire isi baleekelwa boowo, ne balekha khunyala khumuwonesa ta.”
40017017	Yesu welamo ari, “Inywe kumuboolo kukukhafukiilila ta, kumuwandalafu, ise indyoolesa ena khuuba ni nanywe? Ise indyoolesa ena khubekhalilikha? Ni mumunderere ano.”
40017018	Yesu wakhookhela shisaambwa shiibi, ni nasho shamururamo. Ni mu mbuka nyeneyo, umusiinde tsana wawonesebwa.
40017019	Lwanyuma baleekelwa beetsa isi Yesu mu shimoonyo, bamureeba bari, “Umukasya, ne lwashiina ifwe sikhunyalile khuwoona shisaambwa isho ta?”
40017020	Naye Yesu wabelamo ari, “Lwekhuba khufukiilila khweenywe khukyeekhe. Ilala imbaboolela ndi, ni muba ni khufukiilila nga khulekhaana nga khamiitso kaladaali, munyala khuloma lukiingi luno muri, ‘Rura khukhwama ano, utsye iyo, nio nalwo luliitsya.’ Imbaawo shishiilibabeela shihangafu ta.” (
40017021	Ne shino sishinyala shakholebwa ni lomo yoosi ta, khurusakho ni khuloomba, ni khubuya intsala.)
40017022	Nga Yesu ni baleekelwa beewe boosi beetsile atweela i Galilaaya, Yesu wabalomela ari, “Umwana w'Omundu atsya khuwanibwayo mu mikhono kye babandu.
40017023	Balimwiira, ne khu shifukhu she khataru, alilamusibwa khukhwama mu bafu.” Ni baleekelwa kumutaambo kwabawamba.
40017024	Lwanyuma nga Yesu ni baleekelwa beewe boolele i Kaperunaumu, babusanisi be kumusolo kwe Lisaayilo Likhulu beetsa isi Petero bamureeba bari, “Umuleekeli weenywe asasula kumusolo kwe Lisaayilo Likhulu?”
40017025	Petero wabelamo ari, “E e, naawa.” Ne Petero n'ola mu ntsu nga ashiili khuloma ilomo yoosi ta, Yesu wamureeba ari, “Simoni, iwe wambaasa urye? Bayinga be shibala, kumusolo namwe busuulu babibusanisa khukhwama khu banaanu? Khukhwama khu baana baawe basiinde namwe khukhwama khu bareende?”
40017026	Petero welamo ari, “Khukhwama khu bareende.” Yesu wamuloma ari, “Isho shokesa shiri, babaana bali be lukoosi.
40017027	Ne khulekha khubakhalasa ta, tsya khu nyaantsa, utuume kumulobo kwoowo mu meetsi, uwambise tsinyeeni. Ne iyo yeesi kane unyoowe khuwambisa, wasamise mu khanwa mwayo, kane unyoolemo lipeesa. Kane uliyile, ulibawe, khusasula kumusolo kwase ni kukwoowo.”
40018001	Mu saawa nyene iyo, baleekelwa beetsa isi Yesu, bamureeba bari, “Naanu ufuura bukhulu mu Buyinga bwe mwikulu?”
40018002	Yesu walaanga umwana umufwiiti, wamwimisa akari awe,
40018003	waloma ari, “Ilala imbaboolela ndi, ni mukhashuukha mwekyela nga babaana bafwiiti, simulinyala khukhwinjila mu Buyinga bwe mwikulu ta.
40018004	Aso, umundu yeesi uwihombeekha nga umwana yuno umufwiiti, niye ufuura bukhulu mu Buyinga bwe mwikulu.
40018005	Na buli uyo yeesi uwakaanila umwana umufwiiti nga yuno, mu lisiina lyase, aba wantsakaaniile ise.
40018006	“Ne umundu yeesi ulikhonjelesa mutweela khu bafwiiti bano babafukiilila, wabayila mu khwoneka, shiba shilayi umundu uyo abowebwe lusisi lukali mu milo mweewe, bamutuume esiikhe mu nyaantsa indeeyi naabi.
40018007	Ne nga she kumutaambo isi shibala lwe bilomo bibireerera babandu khukhwoneka! Bibindu bino byaakha biitse, ne she kumutaambo isi uyo ubireera!
40018008	“Noola kumukhono kwoowo namwe shikyele shoowo shikhuyila mu khwoneka, shiremekho, ushituume. Lwekhuba shikhubeela shilayi iwe khukhwinjila mu bulamu nga uli umuleme, namwe nga s'uli ni kumukhono, namwe ni shikyele, khufuura khutuumibwa mu mulilo kukhasima nga uli ni kamakhono kyoowo kyoombi, namwe ni bikyele byoowo byoombi.
40018009	Namwe noola imoni yoowo ikhuyila mu khwoneka, kirusemo ukituume aleeyi. Lwekhuba shikhubeela shilayi iwe khukhwinjila mu bulamu nga uli ni moni ndweela, khufuurisa khutuumibwa mu mulilo kukukhasima ta, nga uli ni tsimoni tsoowo tsoombi.”
40018010	“Inywe ni mubone muri, simulekelesa mutweela khu bafwiiti bano ta. Lwekhuba imbaboolela ndi busheele bamalayika baawe mwikulu babona mu moni mwa Wele mwikulu. (
40018011	Lwekhuba Umwana w'Omundu etsa khuwonesa isho shishakoraana.)
40018012	Inywe mwambaasa muryeena? Umundu n'aba ni kamasheese keewe shitoondo shitweela, ne litweela khu niko lyakoraanakho, s'alekha kamakhumi syeenda na syeenda khu lukiingi, watsya nga aweentsa litweela ilyo lilyakoraanile?
40018013	Ne n'alinyoola, ilala imbaboolela ndi, ekhoyela naabi lisheese litweela ilyo, khufuurisa iko kamakhumi syeenda na syeenda kakakhakorere ta.
40018014	Musaambo iyo niyo ndweela, Papa weenywe uli mwikulu, s'afukiilisa mutweela khu bafwiiti bano khuhela ta.
40018015	“Ne wandaayo nga wonakile is'uli, n'utsye is'ali umuboolele buubi bweewe nga muli babili mweembi mwenyene. Ne nakhuwulila iwe uba wekoboseele wandaayo is'uli.
40018016	Ne nakhuminyaalila, n'utsye n'umundu ukuundi mutweela namwe babili, nio akile buli shindu shoosi shihangasiwe ni bujulisi bwe baboni babili namwe bataru.
40018017	Ne ni eloosela khuminyaala, boolela lisaayilo lye bafukiilisi boosi, ne n'aloba khuwulila lisaayilo lyoosi, ari ni mumuyile nga umunaambo namwe nga umubusanisi we kumusolo.
40018018	“Ilala imbaboolela ndi, byoosi byeesi mubowa khu shibala, bilibowebwa ni mwikulu, ni nebyo byeesi mukangulula khu shibala, bilikangululiwa ni mwikulu.
40018019	Lundi imbaboolela ndi, nga babili mwiinywe ni bafukiilisana khu shindu shoosi sheesi baloomba khu shibala, kane Papa weenywe uli mwikulu ashibakholele.
40018020	Lwekhuba isi babili namwe bataru babusanila mu lisiina lyase, nase imbawo akari abwe.”
40018021	Lwanyuma Petero weetsa isi Yesu, wamureeba ari, “Umukasya, wandaayase nga wonakile isi indi, kane imwiyakhile kimilundi kyeenga? Niyakhile khukhwolesa kimilundi musaafu?”
40018022	Yesu wamwiilamo ari, “Akhuba kimilundi musaafu ta, ne njeeba kamakhumi musaafu kimilundi musaafu.
40018023	Ni nashiryo, Buyinga bwe mwikulu bufwananisibwa n'umuyinga mutweela uwakana khukwalaasa bye tsinusu tseewe ni babakaanisi beewe.
40018024	Ne nga n'arakikha khubala, bamureerera umusaani mutweela yeesi aba abaantsa tsinusu kimikaanda likhumi.
40018025	Ne lwekhuba umwakaanisi yuno s'anyala khumuliyila ta, umuyinga walakila ari umusaani bamukulise, n'umukhasi weewe, ni babaana beene, ni bibindu byeewe byoosi byeesi aba nabyo, bimuliyile likobi.
40018026	Umwakaanisi tsana yuno wafukhama asi is'ali, wamwikontselela ari, ‘N'untsikhalilikhekho, nase kane ikhuliyile bibyoowo byoosi.’
40018027	Umuyinga yuno wamuwambila shiisa, wamwiyakhila likobi, wamulekhuula.
40018028	“Ne umwakaanisi mweene yuno n'arura watsya, wakaanana mutweela khu bakaanisi basheewe, esi naye aba abaantsa tsinusu shitoondo shitweela, wamukwa mumilo, wamukoka, nga amuloma ari, ‘N'undiyile bibyase byoosi byeesi ikhubaantsa.’
40018029	Umwakaanisi washeewe yuno wafukhama asi, nga amwikontselela ari, ‘N'untsikhalilikhekho, nase kane ikhuliyile.’
40018030	Ne niye walekha khushifukiilila ta, wamuyila wamura mu mapuusu ari khukhwoolesa n'akane amuliyile likobi.
40018031	Ne babakaanisi basheewe ni bashibona baryo, bakhalala naabi, nabo baatsya basontsoola umuyinga wawe byoosi bibibelewo.
40018032	Aryo umuyinga walaanga umwakaanisi tsana yuno, wamuloma ari. ‘Iwe umwakaanisi ukhalimo, ise nakhwiyakhiile likobi lyoowo lyoosi, lwekhuba wantsikontselela.
40018033	Nawe sishakhwakhiile khuwambila umwakaanisi uwashoowo shiisa, nga ise ni nakhuwambiile iwe?’
40018034	Mu bukhalafu bukali, umuyinga yuno wamuwambisa basilikhale bamuwe shitaambiso, khukhwoolesa n'akane amale khumuliyila likobi lyoosi.”
40018035	Yesu wamalilisayo nga aloma ari, “Aryo Papa wase uwe mwikulu n'alibakhola inywe, buli mundu n'akheyakhila wandaaye mu mwoyo kweewe.”
40019001	Ulwo nga Yesu wamalile khuloma aryo, warura i Galilaaya, watsya mu shaalo she Buyudaaya, injelekha we luluutsi Yorudaani.
40019002	Kamatuuli makali ke babandu kamulondelela, naye wabawonesela ibweene iyo.
40019003	Bafarisaayo beetsa is'ali khumukhakilisa. Bamureeba bari, “Shifukiilisibwa mu makambila keefwe umundu khuwoona umukhasi weewe nga amufunisa buli lomo yoosi?”
40019004	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Simwasomatsakakho bibyaronebwa bikhosefu bibiloma biri, ‘Iburakikhilo, umubuumbi abuumba boombi umusaani n'umukhasi?’
40019005	Nio ndi waloma ari, ‘Lwe lomo yino, umusaani alilekha papawe ni maayiwe, etubaase n'umukhasi weewe, ni nabo boombi bekyele kumubili mutweela?’
40019006	Ni nashiryo, sibaba bashiili babili ta, ne baba bekyelile kumubili mutweela. Aso, sheesi Wele aba watubaasile atweela, umundu yeesi akhawukhanisa ta.”
40019007	Bafarisaayo bamureeba bari, “Ne lwashiina Musa alakila ari, umusaani awe umukhasi weewe ibaluwa iye khumuwoona nio amuwoone?”
40019008	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Musa abafukiilisa khuwoona bakhasi beenywe lwekhuba kimyoyo kyeenywe sikileekikhila ta. Ne khukhwama makiboole sishaba shiryo ta.
40019009	Ne imbaboolela ndi, buli umundu yeesi uwoona umukhasi weewe, khurusakho khulwe buyeyani, ne wakhwa ukuundi, aba wayeyanile.”
40019010	Kila baleekelwa beewe bamuloma bari, “Noola bili biryo by'omuseetsa n'umukhasi, shiba shilayi khulekha khukhwa ta.”
40019011	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Sibali boosi babanyala khufukiilisa bilomo bino ta, khurusakho isi ibo bababiweebwa.
40019012	Lwekhuba iliwo tsilomo tsikhali ndweela tsitsireesa basaani balekha khukhwa ta. Baliwo babandu babakhakhwa ta, lwekhuba basaalikha baryo; baliwo babaandi babakhakhwa ta, lwekhuba bayomolebwa ni babandu, baliwo babaandi babakhakana khuukhwa ta lwe Buyinga bwe mwikulu. Uyo unyala khukhola shino, n'afukiilile khuleekelwa khuno.”
40019013	Shifukhu shitweela, babandu bareera babaana bafwiiti isi Yesu bari abarekho kamakhono keewe, lundi abaloombele. Ne baleekelwa beewe barafuyila ibo bababareera.
40019014	Ne Yesu waloma ari, “Ni mubalekhe babaana bafwiiti beetse isi indi, mukhabashinjilila ta, lwekhuba Buyinga bwe mwikulu buli bwe babafwana nga bano.”
40019015	Aryo lwanyuma nga wabareerekho kamakhono keewe, warurayo, watsya.
40019016	Lwanyuma abonekhawo umusaani umuyindifu uweetsa isi Yesu, wamureeba ari, “Umuleekeli, ikhole shilayi shiina, nio ifune bulamu bukhawawo ta?”
40019017	Yesu wamwiilamo ari, “Lwashiina undeeba khwiibyo bibiwaamba khu shilayi? Aliwo mutweela yenyene niye uli Umulayi. Ne noola ukana khukhwinjila mu bulamu, wulilatsaka kamakambila.”
40019018	Umusaani tsana wamureeba ari, “Niko kali?” Yesu wamwiilamo ari, “Ukheera ta, ukhayeyana ta, ukheeba ta, ukhaapa umundu washoowo liyino ta.
40019019	Yiisatsakamo papawo ni maayiwo lukoosi, lundi ukanatsake umwesanwa woowo, nga iwe ni wikana wamweene.”
40019020	Umusaani tsana yuno wamwiilamo ari, “Ibyo byoosi naabiwambatsaka, ne shiina shishiindi shishindaambakho?”
40019021	Yesu naye wamwiilamo ari, “Noola ukana khuuba umukwalaafu, tsya, ukulise ibyo byoosi byeesi uli nabyo, ukabile bataambi bibyaamamo, ulwo kane ube ni buyindifu mwikulu. Lwanyuma wiitse unondelele.”
40019022	Ne umusaani yuno n'awulila shino, watsya nga mukhalafu naabi, lwekhuba aba ni buyindifu bukali naabi.
40019023	Lwanyuma Yesu walomela baleekelwa beewe ari, “Ilala imbaboolela ndi shiliiba shihangafu naabi umundu umuyindifu khukhwinjila mu Buyinga bwe mwikulu.
40019024	Lundi imbaboolela ndi, shili shangukho ingamya khubirira mu mwanya kwe mpiso, khufuurisa umundu umuyindifu khukhwinjila mu Buyinga bwa Wele.”
40019025	Ne baleekelwa ni baawulila shino, beyaanga busa nga bareeba bari, “Ari naanu unyala khuwonesebwa?”
40019026	Yesu wabalolelela, wabaloma ari, “Isi babandu shino sishinyalikhana ta, ne isi Wele bibindu byoosi binyalikhana.”
40019027	Lwanyuma Petero wamwiilamo ari, “Bona ifwe khwalekha byoosi, khwakhulondelela iwe, ne khulifuna shiina?”
40019028	Yesu wabaloma ari, “Ilala imbaboolela ndi, mu muboolo kumushaakha nga Umwana w'Omundu wekhaale khu shitsoloŋo she shiriifwa, ni nanywe mumuliba nga munondelela, mulikhala khu bitsoloŋo likhumi na bibili, nga mukhalila bikuuka likhumi na bibili bye ba Isiraeli kumusaango.
40019029	Na buli mundu yeesi uwalekha tsinusu, namwe babandaaye, namwe bakooko, namwe papawe, namwe maayiwe, namwe babaana, namwe kimikuunda khu lwase, alifuna kimilundi shitoondo khufuurisakho, lundi asikhile bulamu bubukhawawo ta.
40019030	Ne bakali babaali bakiboole ari, baliiba bamalilisi, ni bamalilisi ari, baliiba bakiboole.”
40020001	Yesu waboolela lusimo lulundi ari, “Buyinga bwe mwikulu bufwananakho n'umundu uwaba mweene mukuunda, uwarura kumutikhinyi, mu mamilimili, khuutsya khupangisa babandu bamuraambile mu mukuunda kweewe kwe kimizabibu.
40020002	Naye aryo n'amala khufukiilisana ni nabo khubasasula i Dinari ndweela iyaba kumukheemba kwe shifukhu, wabarumana mu mukuunda kweewe kwe kimizabibu.
40020003	Ne n'arura lundi khu saawa iye khataru, wabona babandu babandi bemile awo mu khatale nga mbaawo sheesi bali khukhola ta.
40020004	Nabo wabaloma ari, ‘Ni nanywe ni mutsye muraambe mu mukuunda kwase kwe kimizabibu, nase kane imbasasule shishakhila.’
40020005	Nabo baryo baatsya. Warura lundi khu saawa iye khasesaba, ni khu saawa iye shisheenda, wakhola shishindu sheene nisho shitweela.
40020006	Ne lundi ndi khu saawa iye likhumi na ndweela, wanyoola babandi nga bemile awo busa, nabo wabaloma ari, ‘Lwashiina mwemile ano busa nga simuli ni sheesi mukhola shifukhu shoosi ta?’
40020007	Nabo bamwiilamo bari, ‘Lwekhuba mbaawo umundu yeesi ukhupangisile ta.’ Naye wabaloma ari, ‘Ni nanywe ni mutsye muraambe mu mukuunda kwase kwe kimizabibu.’
40020008	“Buryo antsye ni bwoola angoloobe, umweene mukuunda tsana walomela umuraambisi weewe ari, ‘laanga baraambi ubasasule kumukheemba kwawe, nga unyoowela khu beetsile lwanyuma, umaliliseyo ni babanyoowele.’
40020009	Ne ibo babasimama khuraamba khu saawa iye likhumi na ndweela ni beetsa, buli mutweela wafuna i Dinari iyaba kumukheemba kwe shifukhu.
40020010	Ibo nabo babanyoowa khupangisibwa ni beetsa, bambaasa bari batsya khufuna khufuurisakho. Ne buli mutweela khu nibo wafuna i Dinari nyene ndweela.
40020011	Ne ni baamala khufuna, beŋuluŋuunyila umweene mukuunda
40020012	nga baloma bari, ‘Bano babeetsile lwanyuma baraambila isaawa ndweela yonyene, wabalekhaasa ni nafwe, khukhurekanile ni busiro bwe shifukhu shoosi kumuumu nga kukhwoosha?’
40020013	“Ne naye welamo mutweela khu nibo ari, ‘Mulebe, ise nakhukhubirisa buubi ta. Shimufukiilisaane ni nase i dinari ndweela iye shifukhu?
40020014	Bukula kumukheemba kwoowo utsye. Ise ngana khuuwa ukuundi yuno umumalilisi nga iwe.
40020015	Wambaasa ise siindi ni bunyala khukhola byeesi ingana ni tsinusu tsase? Namwe undola ise imoni imbi lwe bulayi bwase?’ ”
40020016	Yesu wamalilisa ari, “Baryo bamalilisi baliiba babanyoowa, ni babanyoowa, baliiba bamalilisi.”
40020017	Lwanyuma Yesu n'aba nga aniina i Yerusalemu, wayila baleekelwa likhumi na babili andulo, wabaloma ari,
40020018	“Bona ari khuniina i Yerusalemu, ne Umwana w'Omundu balimuwaanayo isi basaayi bakhulu, n'isi baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa. Nabo balimukhalila kumusaango kwe khuufwa,
40020019	nalundi bamuwaneyo isi Banaambo khumutyabila, bamukhupe, lundi atsangililwe khu musalaba. Ne khu shifukhu she khataru, alilamusibwa khukhwama mu bafu.”
40020020	Lwanyuma maayi we babaana ba Zebedaayo weetsa isi Yesu ni babaana beewe, wafukhama asi nga alikho ni sheesi akana khumuloomba.
40020021	Yesu wamureeba ari “Ukana shiina?” Naye welamo Yesu ari, “Fukiilisa uri babaana baase bano boombi kane bekhale, mutweela khu mukhono kwoowo kumulayi n'ukuundi khu mukhono kwoowo kumunyeletsi mu Buyinga bwoowo.”
40020022	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Inywe simumanya sheesi muloomba ta. Inywe munyala khuunywa khu shikhopo she butsiina sheesi ise intsya khunywakho?” Nabo bamwiilamo bari, “E e khunyala.”
40020023	Yesu wabaloma ari, “Ilala khu shikhopo shase she butsiina mulinywakho, ne bye khukhwikhala khu mukhono kwase kumulayi, namwe khu munyeletsi, shiili ise ukhukaba ta. Biifwo ibyo byaabo beesi Papa wase amala khubiŋoonaŋoonela.”
40020024	Ne baleekelwa babaramile likhumi ni bawulila shino, bakhalalila bashaawe babili bano.
40020025	Yesu wabalaanga boosi atweela is'ali, wabaloma ari, “Mwamanya muri bawuli be Banaambo babayila ni kamaani. Ni baraangilisi baawe be angaaki bababakho ni bunyala.
40020026	Ne mus'inywe singene shibe shiryo ta. Akhali ndi buli mundu yeesi ukana khuuba umukhulu mwiinywe, akha khuuba umwakaanisi wenywe,
40020027	ni nooyo ukana khuuba unyoowa mwiinywe akha khuuba umwakaanisi wenywe.
40020028	Nga ni shili ndi Umwana w'Omundu s'etsa khukhwakaanisibwa ta, ne njeeba khukhwakaanisa, ni khuwanayo bulamu bweewe khuuba she khusikula lwe khuwonesa bakali.”
40020029	Ne Yesu ni baleekelwa beewe ni baaba nga barura mu Yeriko, lituuli lye babandu bakali lyamuloondakho.
40020030	Ne abawo basaani babofu babili babaaba bekhaale khu ndulo khwe ntsila, ni bawulila bari Yesu alikho abirawo, balomela angaaki bari, “Umukasya, Mwitsukhulu wa Daudi, khuwambile shiisa!”
40020031	Ne lituuli lye babandu lyabarafuyila, nga babaloma bari basile busa, ne babofu beloosela khulomela angaaki bari, “Umukasya, Mwitsukhulu wa Daudi, khuwambile shiisa.”
40020032	Kila Yesu weema, wabalaanga. Wabareeba ari, “Mukana ise imbakholele shiina?”
40020033	Nabo bamwiilamo bari, “Umukasya, khukana tsimoni tseefwe tsibimbukhe.”
40020034	Yesu wabawambila shiisa, watiila khu moni tsaawe. Lubaluba, banyalisa khubona, bamuloondelela.
40021001	Ne ni baaba nga bali ambi khukhwoola i Yerusalemu, beetsa i Betifage, khu lukiingi lwe Kimizeyituni. Yesu warumana babili khu baleekelwa beewe,
40021002	nga abaloma ari, Ni mutsye mu shaalo shishibali ibweeni, khangukho kane munyoole ipunda nga bakibowele ni nyana yayo. Mutsabule, mutsinderere.
40021003	Ne umundu yeesi n'abalomayo ilomo yoosi, mumuloma muri, “Umukasya niye utsikana, ni naye kane atsakaanise khangukho.”
40021004	Shino shakholekha khukhwolelesa shishakanikhibwa khubirira mu muŋoosi shiri,
40021005	“Boolela shiriimba sha Sayuuni muri, ‘Bona umuyinga woowo etsa is'uli, umuwolu lundi nga etsila khu sikilya ni khu nyana ye sikilya.’ ”
40021006	Baleekelwa baatsya, banyoola nga Yesu n'abalomela.
40021007	Baryo bareera ipunda, ni nyana yayo, batsibiimbakho tsingubo tsaawe, naye Yesu wekhalakho.
40021008	Lituuli lye babandu bakali baala tsingubo khu ntsila, ne babandi barema tsisakya khu bisaala, baala khu ntsila.
40021009	Lituuli lye babandu babaaba barangiile, ni naabo babaaba bamuloondelekho, bayokesela angaaki bari, “Hosana isi Umwitsukhulu wa Daudi, ali ni khabi uyo uwitsila mu lisiina ly'Omukasya. Hosana, angaaki lukali.”
40021010	Aryo Yesu ni enjila mu Yerusalemu, shiriimba shoosi shayeŋanisibwa, nga baloma bari, “Naanu uyu?”
40021011	Kamatuuli ke babandu belamo bari, “Oyu niye Umuŋoosi Yesu, uwama mu Nazareesi mu Galilaaya.”
40021012	Yesu wenjila mu Lisaayilo Likhulu lya Wele, watimisa warusa ibulafu ibo boosi babaaba bakulaanilamo. Wafumalikhaka tsimeetsa tsaabo babaaba bakulaanisa tsinusu, ni bitsoloŋo byaabo babakulisa kamawuusi.
40021013	Yesu wabaloma ari, “Sharonebwa mu byaronebwa bikhosefu shiri, ‘Intsu yase kane ilaangibwatsake intsu iye khuloomba, ne inywe mwakikalusile khuuba lifuluma lye banuuli.’ ”
40021014	Lwanyuma, babofu ni baleme beetsa is'ali mu Lisaayilo Likhulu, wabawonesa boosi.
40021015	Ne basaayi bakhulu ni baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa bakhalala naabi ni babona bibindu bye kamakaanga byeesi Yesu akhola, ni babaana nga bayokesela angaaki mu Lisaayilo Likhulu bari, “Hosana isi Umwitsukhulu wa Daudi.”
40021016	Kila bareeba Yesu bari, “Uwulila byeesi babaana bano baloma?” Yesu wabelamo ari, “E e, nawuliile. Ne simwasomatsakakho muri, ‘khukhwama mu khanwa khe babaana ni baŋaalye, wayiŋoonaŋoonela lubuyi?’ ”
40021017	Aryo Yesu wabalekha, warura mu shiriimba, watsya i Besaniya esi akonela shiilo isho.
40021018	Kumutikhinyi mu mamilimili, Yesu aba elayo mu shiriimba, intsala abe ilikho imulya.
40021019	Aryo nga waboone kusaala ku Figi khu ndulo khwe ntsila, watsyakho, ne walekha khunyoolakho shishindu shoosi ta, akhali kamasaafu konyene. Kila Yesu waloma kusaala ari, “Kusaalawe, s'ukane wanatsakekho bibyaano lundi ta.” Ni abweene awo, kusaala kwanialilawo.
40021020	Ne baleekelwa ni baabona shino beyaanga naabi nga baloma bari, “Kusaala ku figi kuno kunialile kuryeena khangukho?”
40021021	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Ilala imbaboolela ndi, ni muba ni khufukiilila, mwalekha khwikanakana ta, munyala khukhola isho shishikholewele khu kusaala kuno kwe bibyaano, ni khulooselakho, munyala khuloma lukiingi luno muri, ‘Wamweene sutikha busa utsye, wituume mu nyaantsa,’ ni nasho shilikholebwa.
40021022	Ni muba ni khufukiilila, muliweebwa shoosi shoosi sheesi mukana mu khuloomba khweenywe.”
40021023	Yesu wenjila mu Lisaayilo Likhulu, ne n'aba nga aleekela, basaayi bakhulu ni basakhulu be babandu beetsa is'ali, bamureeba bari, “Uli na bunyala shiina bubukhukholisa bibindu bino? Naanu uwakhuwa bunyala buno?”
40021024	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Nase kane imbareebe shireebo shitweela. Ne nga mwantsililemo, nase kane imbaboolele bunyala nga ni buli bubungolesa ise bibindu bino.
40021025	Khubatisibwa khwa Yohana Umubatisa khwama ena? Khwama mwikulu namwe khwama mu bandu?” Bareebana bonyene na bonyene nga baloma bari, “Ni kane khulome khuri, khwama mwikulu, kane akhureebe ari, ‘Ne shiina kila mukhamufukiilila?’
40021026	Ne ni kane khulome khuri, khwama mu bandu, khurya lituuli lye babandu, lwekhuba boosi bamanya bari, Yohana Umubatisa aba umuŋoosi.”
40021027	Ni nashiryo belamo Yesu bari, “Sikhumanya ta.” Yesu naye wabelamo ari, “Ni nase singene imbaboolele bunyala ni buli bubungolesa bibindu bino ta.”
40021028	“Inywe mwambaasa murye? Abawo umusaani mutweela, uwaba ni babaana beewe basooleli babili. Watsya isi unyoowa wamuloma ari, ‘Mwana wase, tsya uraambe mu mukuunda kwe kimizabibu shaleelo.’
40021029	Umwana yuno welamo ari, ‘Shinatsya ta.’ Ne lwanyuma webiyisa mu mwoyo kweewe, watsya.
40021030	Lwanyuma umusaali tsana watsya isi uwe khabili, wamulomela aryo, nga n'alomela uwanyoowa. Umusooleli yuno welamo ari, ‘E e papa.’ Ne walekha khuutsya khuraamba ta.”
40021031	Kila Yesu abareeba ari, “Khu babili bano, naanu uwakhola sheesi papa wabwe akana?” Nabo belamo bari, “Uwanyoowa.” Yesu wabaloma ari, “Ilala imbaboolela ndi, babusanisi be kumusolo, ni bamalaaya balikho babanyoowa inywe khukhwinjila mu Buyinga bwa Wele.
40021032	Lwekhuba Yohana Umubatisa etsa isi muli khubokesa intsila ye bukwalaafu, ne inywe mwalekha khumufukiilila ta, ne babusanisi be kumusolo ni bamalaaya bamufukiilila. Ne akhaba nga mwabona muryo, simwakyelawo mwebiyisa, mwamufukiilila ta.”
40021033	Yesu wababoolela lusimo lulundi ari, “Abawo umusaani mweene mukuunda, uwabyaalamo kumuzabibu kweewe. Wakusirira lumako khukubotokhelela, wayabilamo lirokelo lye viini, wombekhamo kumunaala. Lwanyuma wapangisisa kumukuunda tsana isi balimi, aryo wamawo, watsya mu shibala she aleeyi.
40021034	Imbuka ye likyesa ni yoola, warumana babakaanisi beewe isi balimi, ari bamuwekho bibyaano byamwo.
40021035	Ne balimi bawamba babakaanisi beewe, mutweela bamukhupaka, ukuundi bamwiira, n'uwe khataru bamukhupa kamabaale.
40021036	Lundi ndi warumanayo babakaanisi babandi, babafuurakho babanyoowa. Ne nabo babakhola baryo nga babanyoowa.
40021037	Lwanyuma wabarumanila umwana weewe umweene, nga aloma ari, ‘Manya lukanile kane besemo umwana wase shiriifwa.’
40021038	Ne balimi ni baabona umwana w'omweene mukuunda, bekuta bonyene bari, ‘Mbo oyu niye umusikha, yiitsa khumwiire, khuyile busikha bweewe.’
40021039	Baryo bamuwamba, bamutuuma ibulafu we kumukuunda, bamwiira.”
40021040	Ulwo Yesu wabareeba ari, “Nga umweene mukuunda wetsile, balimi ibo alibakhola aryeena?”
40021041	Nabo bamwiilamo bari, “Babandu baabi ibo, alibahesa, ni kumukuunda akupangise isi balimi babandi, babaalimuwa bibyaano byeewe mu mbuka inyene iye likyesa.”
40021042	Aryo kila Yesu abaloma ari, “Mwakhusomatsakakho bibyaronebwa bikhosefu bibiloma biri, ‘Libaale lyeesi babombekhi bekaana, lyashuukha lyekyela khuuba kumurwe kwe musoonda. Umukasya umweene niye uwakhola shino, lundi shiyaangisa mu moni tseefwe.’
40021043	“Nashiryo, imbaboolela ndi, Buyinga bwa Wele bulibarusibwakho inywe buweebwe linaambo lilinyala lyaana bibyaano bilayi.
40021044	Umundu yeesi ukwa khu libaale lino alifuniakikhaka busa, ne uyo esi lilikwakho, lilimubulyungulaka busa.”
40021045	Baryo basaayi bakhulu ni Bafarisaayo nga bawuliile tsisimo tsa Yesu tsino, bamanya bari aba alikhubaloma khu nibo.
40021046	Baryo bakhakakho naabi khuweentsa imbuka bamuwambe, ne baarya kamatuuli lwekhuba babandu bamwambaasa khuuba umuŋoosi.
40022001	Yesu wakanikha lundi ni nabo musimo, wabaloma ari,
40022002	“Buyinga bwe mwikulu bufwananisibwa n'umuyinga uwaŋoonaŋoona kamayiiya ke bukhwaale bw'omwana weewe umusiinde.
40022003	Lwanyuma warumana babakaanisi beewe khuutsya khulaanga ibo babalaangiwa khu mayiiya ke bukhwaale, ne nibo balekha khukana khukhwiitsa ta.
40022004	Lundi ndi warumana babakaanisi babandi nga aloma ari, ‘Ni mutsye muboolele ibo babalaangiwa muri, ise naŋoonaŋoonele kamayiiya kaase, tsikhaafu tse kiminaawa tseriiwile. Bibindu byoosi byaŋoonaŋoonewele. Ari ni mwiitse khu mayiiya ke bukhwaale.’
40022005	Ne nibo balekha khukhwinaanayo ta, baryo betsiilakila mu ntsila tsaawe tsitsiindi: mutweela watsya mu mukuunda kweewe, ukuundi watsya mu bye bukusi bweewe.
40022006	Ne babaramile bawambaka babakaanisi ibo bababirisaka buubi, babeeraka.
40022007	Umuyinga yuno lirima lyamuwamba, warumana liiye lyeewe, wahesaka babeeri ibo, woosha ni shiriimba shaawe.
40022008	Lwanyuma waloma babakaanisi beewe ari, ‘Kamayiiya ke bukhwaale kamaŋoonaŋoone, ne ibo babalaangiwa sibaakhila ta.
40022009	Nashiryo, ni mutsye mu mikhoosi esi kyakananila, mulaange boosi beesi kane muboneyo, beetse khu mayiiya.’
40022010	Baryo babakaanisi baatsya mu mikhoosi, babuusanisa boosi beesi banyalisa khunyoolayo, baabi atweela ni balayi, kamayiiya ketsulakho bakyeni.
40022011	“Ne umuyinga ni enjila khubona bakyeni, wabonamo umusaani uwaba wakhukwaara ingubo iyakhila kamayiiya ke bukhwaale ta.
40022012	Kila amureeba ari, ‘Mulebe, winjiile uryeena ano nga s'uli ni shikwaro shishakhila kamayiiya ta?’ Ne umusaani wasila busa.
40022013	Lwanyuma umuyinga waloma babakaanisi beewe ari, ‘Ni mumubowe kamakhono ni bikyele, mumutuume ibulafu mu shilima. Ibweene iyo iliiba khukhwantsuwa ni khukhwilumaka kameeno.’
40022014	Lwekhuba babalaangiwa bakali, ne barobolemo bakyeekhe.”
40022015	Lwanyumakho, Bafarisaayo baatsya bekutila atweela isaambo yeesi kane bawambilise Yesu mu bilomo.
40022016	Baryo kila bamurumanila baleekelwa baawe atweela ni baloondeleli ba Herode, nga baloma bari, “Umuleekeli, ifwe khwamanya nga iwe uli umundu uwaŋali, lundi uleekela intsila ya Wele nga wimikha mu muŋali ilala, lundi s'unikinisibwa ni babandu ta, lwekhuba siwinaanayo khu mbonekha ye babandu ta.
40022017	Aso khuboolele, iwe wambaasa urye? Shilayi khuuwa kumusolo isi Kayisaali namwe ta?”
40022018	Ne Yesu waba nga wamanyile buubi bwaabwe, wabaloma ari, “Inywe babeeyi, lwashiina muweentsa khukhukhakilisa ise?
40022019	Ni muntsokese lipeesa lyeesi muweelamo kumusolo.” Baryo bamureerera lipeesa lino.
40022020	Kila ndi wabareeba ari, “Shifwani shino, ni buronekho buno, bya naanu?”
40022021	Nabo bamwiilamo bari, “Bya Kayisaali.” Yesu naye wabelamo ari, “Aso, bya Kayisaali, ni mubiwe Kayisaali, ni isi Wele naye mumuwe bye bwa Wele bweewe.”
40022022	Baryo boosi ni bawulila shino belaliila busa. Lwanyuma bamulekha, baatsya.
40022023	Khu shifukhu sheene isho, Basadukaayo, nga nibo babaloma bari mbaawo khulamukha mu bafu ta, beetsa isi Yesu. Nabo beetsa khumureeba shireebo.
40022024	Bamureeba bari, “Umuleekeli, ifwe Musa akhulomela ari, ‘Noola umusaani wafwiile busa nga akhusaala babaana ta, wandaaye akha khukhwiila khu namulekhwa, amusaalile babaana.’
40022025	Ari iweefwe iyo, yabayo bebulebe musaafu. Umukiboole wakhwa umukhasi, ne wafwa nga akhusaala lisaaye ta, walekhela wandaaye weewe umukhasi.
40022026	Shishindu sheene nisho shitweela shakholekha khuwe khabili, n'uwe khataru, khukhwoola khuwe kumusaafu.
40022027	Lwanyuma lwa boosi khuufwa, umukhasi naye wafwa.
40022028	Aso, nga yoolele ikhulamukha khwe baafu, umukhasi yuno aliiba mweene wa naanu, khu bebulebe bano musaafu? Lwekhuba boosi baaba ni naye nga umukhasi wabwe.”
40022029	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Inywe muborokha lwekhuba simumanya bibyaronebwa bikhosefu namwe kamaani ka Wele ta.
40022030	Lwekhuba babandu ni baba nga balamukha khukhwama mu bafu, sibayila bakhasi, namwe sibakhwalikhisibwa ta, ne boosi baliiba nga bamalayika mwikulu.
40022031	Ne ibyo bibiwaamba khu khulamukha khukhwama mu bafu, simwasomatsakakho byeesi Wele abalomela ari,
40022032	‘Ise ndi Wele wa Ibulayimu, Wele wa Isaaka, lundi Wele wa Yakobo?’ Niye s'ali Wele we baafu ta, ne ali Wele we balamu.”
40022033	Lituuli lye babandu ni bawulila baryo, beyaanga busa khuleekela khweewe.
40022034	Nabo Bafarisaayo ni bawulila bari Yesu wabunisile Basadukaayo, babusana atweela.
40022035	Mutweela khu nibo uwaba umuleekeli we kamakambila ka Musa, wakhaka Yesu nga amureeba shireebo, nga aloma ari,
40022036	“Umuleekeli, likambila shiina lilifuura bukhulu mu makambila koosi?”
40022037	Yesu wamwiilamo ari, “Kanatsaka Umukasya Wele woowo, ni kumwoyo kwoowo kwoosi, ni bulamu bwoowo bwoosi, ni kamakyesi koowo koosi.
40022038	Lino nilyo likambila linyoowa lilifuura bukhulu.
40022039	Ni lye khabili lilifwananakho ni nalyo nilyo lino: kanatsaka umwesanwa woowo, nga iwe ni wikana wamweene.
40022040	Mu makambila kano koombi, nimwo mweesi kamakambila koosi, ni khuleekela khwe baŋoosi bimile.”
40022041	Bafarisaayo ni baaba nga babusaane atweela, Yesu wabareeba shireebo ari,
40022042	“Kristo, inywe mumwambaasakho murye? Niye Umwana wa naanu?” Nabo bamwiilamo bari, “Niye Umwitsukhulu wa Daudi.”
40022043	Naye Yesu wabaloma lundi ari, “Ne lwashiina Daudi, nga Umwoyo Umukhosefu amurangilila, amulaanga ari, ‘Umukasya?’ Lwekhuba niye amulomakho ari,
40022044	‘Umukasya aloma Umukasya wase ari: Yikhala ano khu mukhono kwase kumulayi, khukhwolesa ne ndiira basiku boowo asi e bikyele byoowo.’
40022045	“Aso, noola Daudi amulaanga khuuba ‘Umukasya’, anyala aryeena ndi khuuba umwitsukhulu weewe?”
40022046	Ne mbaawo na mutweela yeesi uwanyala khumwiilamo ta, ni khukhwama khu shifukhu isho, mbaawo n'umundu na mutweela uwamutsaalatsaalila khumureebaka bireebo lundi ta.
40023001	Lwanyuma Yesu wakanikha isi kamatuuli ke babandu ni isi baleekelwa beewe, nga abaloma ari,
40023002	“Baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa ni Bafarisaayo bayila bunyala bwa Musa.
40023003	Ni nashiryo mwakhila khuwamba ni khukhola ibyo byoosi byeesi babaloma inywe khukhola. Ne mukhakhola nga nibo ni bakhola ta, lwekhuba nibo sibakhola byeesi baleekela ta.
40023004	Nibo babowa bisutwa bisiro, babira khu mabeka ke babandu babandi, ne nibo babeene nga sibakana ni khukhwinyusa lulwala lwawe lwonyene khubayeetakho ta.
40023005	Nibo byoosi byeesi bakhola, bakhola bari nio babandu bababone. Babalaayisa tsisutilo tsaawe tse bibyaronebwa ni khuleyesa kamayeeye ke bikwaaro byaawe khukhwokesa bari barya Wele.
40023006	Bakana naabi biifwo bye angaaki ali kamayiiya, ni bitsoloŋo bye shiriifwa muntsu tsye khukhwisaayilamo.
40023007	Bakana naabi khusheesebwa mu butale, ni khukana naabi babandu babalaange bari, umuleekeli.
40023008	Ne inywe bakhabalaangatsaka bari, umuleekeli ta, lwekhuba inywe muli n'Umukoosi mutweela, ne inywe mweesi muli bebulebe busa.
40023009	Lundi inywe mukhalaanga umundu yeesi mu shibala muri ‘Papa’ ta, lwekhuba muli ni Papa mutweela yenyene uli mwikulu.
40023010	Namwe mukhalaangiwatsaka muri ‘Bakasya’ ta, lwekhuba muli n'Umukasya mutweela yenyene niye Kristo.
40023011	Uyo ufuura bukhulu mus'inywe, niye ukane abatsake umwakaanisi weenywe.
40023012	Lwekhuba buli mundu yeesi ukane eniinisatsake umweene, alikhisibwa asi, na buli mundu yeesi ukane eyikhisatsake asi umweene, aliniinisibwa angaaki.”
40023013	“Nga she kumutaambo isi inywe baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa, ni Bafarisaayo. Inywe babemunyakasa khu ngaaki, inywe mwikalilila babandu babakana khukhwinjila mu Buyinga bwe mwikulu ibulafu nga babona. Inywe mwabeene simwinjila ta, ate mukhingilila ibo babakhakakho khukhwinjila.
40023014	Nga she kumutaambo inywe baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa ni Bafarisaayo, inywe babemunyakasa khu ngaaki. Munuula tsinusu tse banamulekhwa, ni khukhwiyokesana muri muloomba lukali. Nashiryo, mulikhaliwila kumusaango kukufuura burafu.
40023015	“Nga she kumutaambo inywe baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa ni Bafarisaayo. Inywe babemunyakasa khu ngaaki. Mukyenda osi khu shibala ni khukhwibotokhelela tsinyaantsa, lwe khukana khushuusa umundu mutweela afukiilise mu diini yeenywe, ne nga wafukiiliile, mumwikyelisa khuuba umwana we kumulilo kwe geyeena kimilundi kibili khufuurisa nga mwabeene ni muli.
40023016	“Nga she kumutaambo isi inywe barangilisi babaali babofu! Inywe muloma muri, ‘Umundu yeesi n'akane etsubatsakile Lisaayilo Likhulu, mbaawo ilomo ta, ne uyo yeesi ukane etsubatsakile izaabu iye mwisaayilo likhulu, abowebwa ni shishitsubo sheewe.’
40023017	Inywe babofu basilu! Shiina shishifuura; izaabu namwe Lisaayilo Likhulu lilikyelisa izaabu khuuba ikhosefu?
40023018	Nalundi muloma muri, ‘Umundu yeesi ukane etsubatsake isi shisheeso, shiili lomo ta, ne uyo ukane etsubatsake isi shiwanwa shishiili khu sheeso, abowebwa ni shishitsubo sheewe.’
40023019	Inywe basaani babofu! Shiina shishifuura bukhulu? Shiwanwa namwe shisheeso shishikyelisa shiwanwa khuuba shikhosefu?
40023020	Ni nashiryo uyo yeesi ukane etsubatsake isi shisheeso, aba wetsubiile shisheeso sheene, ni nebyo byoosi bibishilikho.
40023021	Ni nooyo ukane etsubatsakile Lisaayilo Likhulu, aba wetsubiile Lisaayilo Likhulu lyeene, ni nooyo ulimenyamo.
40023022	Ni nooyo ukane etsubatsake isi likulu, aba wetsubiile shitsoloŋo sha Wele ni isi uyo ushikhalakho.
40023023	“Nga she kumutaambo isi inywe baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa ni Bafarisaayo! Inywe babemunyakasa khu ngaaki! Muwa shisiintsa shitweela she likhumi khu bindu byeenywe bibiŋaayisa tsinyanyi nga butungulu, ni bibintsaali, ne mwalekha khwinaanayo isi bibindu bibifuura bukhulu bye kamakambila-nibyo nga bwaŋali, shiisa, ni bubwiyikinwa. Ibyo inywe shibakhila khubikhola, ne mukhatataya bibindi bibiramile ta.
40023024	Inywe barangilisi babofu, mukhakakho naabi khurusamo isame mu biliibwa byeenywe, ne mwamila ingamya nga akhushimanya ta.
40023025	“Nga she kumutaambo inywe baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa ni Bafarisaayo! Inywe babemunyakasa khu ngaaki! Musiinga khu ngaaki khwe shikhopo ni sowani, ne mukari mwayitsula bulyaanga, ni khukhwiiliisa mwabeene mwenyene!
40023026	Iwe Umufarisaayo umubofu! Nyoowa usiinge mukari mwe shikhopo ni sowani, nio akile ni khu ngaaki nakhwo khube khumiliwu.
40023027	“Nga she kumutaambo inywe baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa ni Bafarisaayo! Inywe babemunyakasa khu ngaaki! Inywe muli nga tsiŋani tseesi bawakha luloongo luwanga, nga tsibonekha bulayi khu ngaaki, ne nga mukari tsetsuule kamakuumba ke baafu, ni bunyaalu bwoosi.
40023028	Ni musaambo niyo ndweela, nanywe mubonekha mu bandu bulayi khu ngaaki, nga bakwalaafu, ne mukari mweenywe mwayitsula bubeeyi, ni bubwonaki bukali.
40023029	“Nga she kumutaambo isi inywe baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa ni Bafarisaayo! Inywe babemunyakasa khu ngaaki! Inywe mwombekha tsiŋani tse baŋoosi, nalundi mwawakha mwamiliisa tsiŋani tse bakhosefu.
40023030	Mwamala mwaloma muri, ‘Khuba nga khukhwabawo mu bifukhu bye bakuuka beefwe, khali sikhwetubaasa ni nabo mu khutsukha kamafuki ke baŋoosi ta.’
40023031	Muryo inywe mwekhaliile khaale kumusaango muri, inywe muli babaana baabo babeera baŋoosi.
40023032	Aso, inywe ni mwiloosele mumalilise kumulimo kweesi bakuuka beenywe barakikha!
40023033	Inywe tsindemu! Lundi inywe babaana be tsindemu tse buutwa! Muliwona muryeena khukhaliwila kumusaango kwe geyeena?
40023034	Nashiryo ise indibarumanila baŋoosi ni basaani be kamakyesi, ni baleekeli. Batweela khu nibo mulibeera, mubatsaangilile khu misalaba, babandi khu nibo mubakhupe tsimiimbo nga bali muntsu tseenywe tse khukhwisaayilamo, nga mubakubyeenga khukhwama mu shiriimba shitweela khukhwoola mu shiindi.
40023035	Ni shishamamo nisho shitaambiso she kamafuki ke bakhosefu kakatsutsukha khu shibala, shishiliikwa khwiinywe, khukhwama khu mafuki ka Abeli, khukhwolesa khu mafuki ka Zekariya, umwana wa Berekiya, isi mwerira akari e Lisaayilo Likhulu ni shisheeso.
40023036	Ilala imbaboolela ndi, shitaambiso isho shoosi shiliitsa khu bandu be kumuboolo kuno.”
40023037	“O Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu! Iwe uwiira baŋoosi, nalundi wakhupa kamabaale ibo babarumaniwa is'uli, tsifuunda tseenga tseesi nakanila khubusanisa babandu boowo atweela nga ingokho ni busanisa bubwaana bwayo mu ndaha tsayo, ne iwe walekha khufukiilila ta!
40023038	Ne bona intsu yoowo yalekhewele nga likubili busa.
40023039	Ari ikhuboolela ndi, khukhwama shaleelo, s'ukane umbonekho lundi ta, khukhwolesa ni muliloma muri, ‘Ali ni khabi uyo uwiitsila mu lisiina ly'Omukasya.’ ”
40024001	Yesu warura mu Lisaayilo Likhulu, ne n'aba nga akyeenda atsya, baleekelwa beewe beetsa is'ali khumwokyesa bibyombakhe bye Lisaayilo Likhulu.
40024002	Yesu wabaloma ari, “Mwaboone bibindu bino byoosi? Ilala imbaboolela ndi, mbaawo libaale na litweela lilirama nga lyemile khu lyashe ta! Buli litweela lilituumiwa asi.”
40024003	Yesu n'aba nga wekhaale khu lukiingi lwa Zeyituuni, baleekelwa beewe beetsa is'ali mu shimoonyo bamuloma bari, “Umukasya, khuboolele, bibindu bino byoosi bilibawo liina, nalundi khabonelo khe kamakaanga shiina khakhalibawo khukhwokesa khukhwiitsa khwoowo, ni intsakamo iye shibala?”
40024004	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Ni mwiliinde ilekhe khubawo umundu namutweela ubaborosa ta.
40024005	Lwekhuba bakali baliitsa mu lisiina lyase, nga baloma bari, ‘Ise niye Kristo’, baryo baliborosa bakali.
40024006	Muliwulila busoolo ni tsimboolela tse busoolo, ne ni mubone muri simuyembelesebwa ta. Bino byaakha khubawo, ne intsakamo iba nga ishiili.
40024007	Linaambo lilisoolanisa linaambo lyashe, buyinga bulisoolanisa buyinga, iliibawo intsala ngali, ni khutengasibwa khwe shibala khulibawo mu bisiintsa bikali.
40024008	Bino nibyo bibirakikha butsiina bwe khusaala.
40024009	“Lwanyuma balibawanayo inywe, mutaambisibwe, lundi mwiriibwe, ni kamanaambo koosi kalibabiyila khubafunisa lisiina lyase.
40024010	Khu mbuka nyene iyo, bakali balikhasikha mu khufukiilila khwawe, balyemo bashaawe luwomelo, lundi babiyanile bonyene na bonyene.
40024011	Ulwo, baŋoosi babeeyi bakali baliitsa, baborose babandu bakali.
40024012	Ne lwekhuba kamawuusu kalilosela naabi, khukana khwe bakali khuliwola.
40024013	Ne uyo ulihandalala khukhwolesa ibumaliliso, aliwonesebwa.
40024014	Ni kamakhuwa kamalayi kano ke Buyinga bwe mwikulu, kaliboolelwa mu shibala shoosi, khuuba bujulisi mu manaambo koosi, lwanyuma intsakamo ikhoole.
40024015	“Ne ni mulibona she mbikho shishireera khuhela nga shemile mu shiifwo shikhosefu sheesi Danieli umuŋoosi alomakho. (Uyo usoma akha amanye.)
40024016	Ulwo ibo babaali mu Buyudaaya belukhile mu njiinji.
40024017	Uyo uba ali khu ngaaki khu shisuli she ntsu yeewe, akheekha asi khuutsya khubukula shishindu shoosi mu ntsu ta.
40024018	Ni nooyo uli mu mukuunda akhelayo ingo khuutsya khubukula ingubo yeewe ta.
40024019	Nga bikhaabe bifukhu bye kumutaambo isi bakhasi babaali bisoombo, ni naabo babanuunisa.
40024020	Ni muloombe muri khukhwilukha khweenywe khulekhe khuba mu bifukhu bye bunyifu namwe khu Sabato ta.
40024021	Lwekhuba mu mbuka iyo, ilibawo kumutaambo kumukali kukukhabatsakawo khukhwama khu khurakikha khwe shibala khukhwolesa ari, nalundi sishilibatsakawo shishifwanakho shiryo ta.
40024022	Iba nga bifukhu ibyo bibikhembiyisibwakho ta, khali mbaawo n'umundu na mutweela abe unyala khuwonesebwa ta, ne lwe bulayi bwe barobole ba Wele, bifukhu ibyo bilimbiyisibwa.
40024023	“Mu mbuka iyo, umundu yeesi nakhuloma ari, ‘Bona, Kristo ali ano,’ namwe ari, ‘Uyo,’ mukhamufukiilila ta.
40024024	Lwekhuba ba kristo be bubeeyi bakali ni baŋoosi be bubeeyi baliitsa bakhole bubonelo bukali ni bye kamakaanga, lwe khukana khuborosa bakali. Noola shinyalikha, ni barobole beene.
40024025	Bona, ise nabibabooleele nga imbuka iyo ishiili khwoola ta.
40024026	“Namwe noola babaloma bari, ‘Bona, ali mu mubiimbi,’ mukhatsyayo ta. Namwe bari, ‘Bona, ali ano mu biseenge bye mukari,’ mukhabifukiilila ta.
40024027	Lwekhuba nga khumulikha ni khwama ibwama nyaanga, khwabonekhela i bukwa nyaanga, ni khukhwiitsa khw'Omwana w'Omundu nakhwo khuliiba khuryo.
40024028	Awo aba kumulaambo osi, niwo esi tsingosya tsibusanila.
40024029	“Khaangukho lwanyuma lwe shitaambiso mu bifukhu ibyo, inyaanga ilimaliyisibwa, kumweesi sikulirusa buwaanga bwakwo ta, tsinieniesi tsiliikwa khukhwama mu ngaaki, ni kamaani ke mwikulu kalitengasibwa.
40024030	Lwanyuma lwayo, khabonelo kh'Omwana w'Omundu khalibonekha mu ngaaki, ni kamanaambo koosi ke mu shibala kalilila. Balibona Umwana w'Omundu nga etsila mu namufweeli we mwikulu, ni kamaani ni shiriifwa shikali.
40024031	Nio arumane bamalayika beewe, n'ikhoombi imboofu nga ifuura, ni nabo balibusanisa babandu beewe barobole, khukhwama khu mbeka tsoone, khukhwama khu ndulo khwe likulu khutweela khukhwoola khu khuundi.
40024032	“Aluno ari, ni mwiyikile khu kusaala ku Figi. Tsisakya tsakwo ni tsitsowa, kamaru kasisina, inywe mumanya muri kumunaane kuli ambi.
40024033	Nanywe muryo, ni mubona bibindu bino byoosi, mumanye muri, imbuka ili ambi, nga ili khu mulyaango khubweene.
40024034	Ilala imbaboolela ndi, kumuboolo kuno sikuliwawo ta, khukhwolesa nga bibindu bino byoosi byabelewo.
40024035	Likulu ni shibala biliwawo, ne bilomo byase sibiliwawo ta.
40024036	“Ne bye shifukhu isho ni saawa, mbaawo ubimanya ta, ikhaba bamalayika be mwikulu namwe Umwana ta, khurusakho Papa yenyene.
40024037	Nga ni shaba mu bifukhu bya Nowa, shiryo nga ni shiliiba mu khwiitsa khw'Omwana w'Omundu.
40024038	Lwekhuba mu bifukhu ibyo, nga kameetsi kashiili khusalasala ta, babandu baaba balya, nga banywa, nga bakhwalikha lundi nga bakhwalikhisa, khukhwoolesa khu shifukhu khweesi Nowa enjilila mwikhoŋolo.
40024039	Nibo sibamanya shishindu shoosi shishiitsya mu moni ta, khukhwoolesa kameetsi ni kasalasala, kabasuta boosi kabayila. Ni khukhwiitsa khw'Omwana w'Omundu khuliiba khuryo.
40024040	Basaani babili baliiba mu mukuunda, mutweela aliyilibwa, ukuundi alilekhebwa.
40024041	Ni bakhasi babili baliiba nga basya khu lusisi, mutweela aliyilibwa, ne ukuundi alilekhebwa.
40024042	Ni nashiryo, ni mube meeso, lwekhuba simumanya shifukhu shiina khweesi Umukasya weenywe aliitsilakho ta.
40024043	Ne ni mumanye shino muri, iba nga umweene intsu amanya isaawa shiina iye shiilo yeesi umwiifwi kane etsilemo, khali ekhala meeso, ilekha khubawo umundu yeesi ukifuniaka wenjilamo ta.
40024044	Ni nanywe muryo, mwakha khuuba berekefu, lwekhuba Umwana w'Omundu aliitsila mu saawa isi mukhamwambaasilamo ta.
40024045	“Naanu umwakaanisi umwiyikinwa lundi umukyesi yeesi umukoosi weewe alekhela baraambi be muntsu yeewe khubalolelela, khubawa biilyo mu saawa inyene?
40024046	Nga kane abe ni khabi umwakaanisi uyo isi umukoosi weewe alinyoola nga akhola aryo, n'aliba nga wakoboole.
40024047	Ilala imbaboolela ndi, umukoosi uyo alimukhola khuuba umuloleleli we bibindu byeesi ali nabyo byoosi.
40024048	Ne umwakaanisi uyo n'aba umubi, uwilomela mu mwoyo kweewe ari, ‘Umukoosi wase wekhaaleyo,’
40024049	aryo warakikha khukhupa babakaanisi basheewe, ni khuunywa ni khumeelela atweela ni bameesi.
40024050	Umukoosi w'omwakaanisi uyo alikobolela khu shifukhu khweesi akhamwambasilisilakho ta, ni khu saawa yeesi akhamanyile ta.
40024051	Alimukhalakamo bisiintsasiintsa, aweebwe kumukabo kweewe atweela ni babandu babemunyakasa khu ngaaki busa. Iyo iliiba khulila ni khukhwilumaka kameeno.
40025001	“Khu shifukhu isho, Buyinga bwe mwikulu bulifwananisibwa ni bakhaana likhumi babayila tsitaala tsaawe, barura khuutsya khukhwakaanila umusaani ukhweele umukhasi.
40025002	Ne baraano khu nibo baaba basilu, ne baraano nga bakyesi.
40025003	Ibo babaaba basilu basuta tsitaala tsaawe, ne balekha khuyila ni kamafura kakaandi ta.
40025004	Ne ibo babaaba bakyesi basuta tsitaala tsaawe atweela ni kamafura kakaandi mu macupa.
40025005	Ne umusaani ukhweele n'akyelewa khukhwiitsa, boosi bawungukhila, bakona.
40025006	Ne mu shilo khukari, abawo khulaangilila bari, ‘Bona ukhweele woolile, ni murure mu mwakaanile.’
40025007	Bakhaana boosi benyukha, baŋoonaka tsitaala tsaawe.
40025008	Ne babaaba basilu tsana balomela bakyesi tsana bari, ‘Ni mukhuwekho khu mafura keenywe, lwekhuba tsitaala tseefwe tsilikho tsisima.’
40025009	Bakyesi babelamo bari, ‘Taawe, singene kakhumale ifwe ni nanywe taawe. Khurusakho, ni mutsye isi bakulisila, mwikulile kakeenywe.’
40025010	Ne ni baaba nga batsya khukula kamafura, ukhweele woola. Ibo babaaba berekefu, benjila ni naye khu mayiiya ke bukhwaale, bekalawo lulwiitsi.
40025011	Lwanyumakho bakhaana tsana babaatsya bakobola, baloma bari, ‘Musakhulu, musakhulu, khwikulilewo.’
40025012	Naye wabelamo ari, ‘Ilala imbaboolela ndi inywe ise simbamanyakho ta.’
40025013	“Ni nashiryo, ni mube meeso, lwekhuba simumanya shifukhu namwe isaawa ta.
40025014	“Lundi ndi Buyinga bwe mwikulu bulifwana nga umusaani uwaba atsya lukyeendo lweewe, walaanga babakaanisi beewe, wabalekhela buyindifu bweewe.
40025015	Isi mutweela wamuwa tsi talanta tsiraano tse tsinusu, ukuundi wamuwa tsi talanta tsibili, ni isi ukuundi wamuwa i talanta indweela. Awa buli mutweela nga bunyali bweewe ni bwaba. Lwanyuma warura watsya khu lukyeendo lweewe.
40025016	Khaangukho umusaani uwafuna tsi talanta tsiraano, watsya watsisubulamo, wafunamo tsi talanta tsitsiindi tsiraano.
40025017	Ni nooyo naye uwafuna tsi talanta tsibili, watsisubulamo wafunamo tsitsiindi tsibili.
40025018	Ne umusaani uwafuna i talanta indweela, watsya walima lilowo mwiloba, wabisamo i talanta y'omukoosi weewe tsana.
40025019	“Lwanyuma lwe mbuka indeeyikho, umukoosi we babakaanisi tsana wakobola, wekhala khubalana ni nabo tsinusu tseewe.
40025020	Umusaani uwafuna tsi talanta tsiraano wareera ni tsi talanta tsitsiindi tsiraano, nga aloma ari, ‘Musakhulu, wambikhisa tsi talanta tsiraano, ne bona, nafunilemo tsiraano tsitsiindi.’
40025021	Umukoosi weewe wamuloma ari, ‘Uryoo! iwe umwakaanisi umulayi lundi umwiyikinwa, ubeele umwiyikinwa mu bindu bikyeekhe, ari kane ikhubikhise bibindu bikali. Yiitsa ukabananile atweela kumwikhoyo kw'omukoosi woowo.’
40025022	“Uyo naye uwafuna tsi talanta tsibili weetsa. Waloma ari, ‘Musakhulu, wambikhisa tsi talanta tsibili, ne bona nafunilemo tsi talanta tsitsiindi tsibili.’
40025023	Umukoosi weewe wamuloma ari, ‘Uryoo! iwe umwakaanisi umulayi lundi umwiyikinwa. Ubeele umwiyikinwa mu bindu bikyeekhe, ne ari kane ikhubikhise bibindu bikali. Yiitsa ukabananile atweela kumwikhoyo kw'omukoosi woowo.’
40025024	“Uyo naye uwafuna i talanta ndweela weetsa. Waloma ari, ‘Musakhulu, nakhumanya ndi uli umusaani umuwangafu naabi, ukyesela isi ukhamiitsila ta. Ubusanisila isi ukhahanyila bumiitso ta.
40025025	Nashiryo, ise narya, natsya nabisa i talanta yoowo mwilowo. Bona iyishiina, iyoowo inyene.’
40025026	“Umukoosi weewe wamwiilamo ari, ‘Iwe umwakaanisi umubi, lundi umutoro! Iwe wamanya uryeena uri injesa sheesi ikhaamiitsa ta, lundi nabusanisa byeesi ikhahanyila bumiitso ta?
40025027	Nashiryo, khali wawa basubusi tsinusu tsase, ni khu mbuka yeesi ingobolelemo, nandifunilekho tsitsase tsinyene ni kamafuurisa.’
40025028	Ni mumurusekho i talanta nyene, mukiwe uyo uli ni tsi talanta likhumi.
40025029	Lwekhuba buli mundu ulikho ni shishiindu, balimuloselakho, ni naye aliiba ni bikali. Ne uyo ukhalikho nasho ta, ni naakho khakyeekhe kheesi ali nakho, balikhamurusakho.
40025030	Ne umwakaanisi uyo umubi, ni mumutuume ibulafu mu shilima, iyo iliiba khulila ni khukhwilumaka kameeno.
40025031	“Nga Umwana w'Omundu wetsiile mu shiriifwa sheewe, ni bamalayika boosi nga bali ni naye, alikhala khu shitsoloŋo sheewe, mu shiriifwa she mwikulu.
40025032	Kamanaambo koosi kalibusanisibwa mu moni tseewe, ni naye alyawukhanisamo babandu nga umwaayi n'awulamo kamasheese ni tsimbusi.
40025033	Kamasheese alikara khu mukhono kweewe kumulayi, ni tsimbusi khu mukhono kumunyeletsi.
40025034	Lwanyuma umuyinga aliloma ibo babaali khu mukhono kweewe kumulayi ari, ‘Yiitsa, inywe beesi Papa awa tsikhabi. Ni mwinjile mufune Buyinga bubwaŋoonewaŋoonewa khulweenywe khukhwama khu khubuumbibwa khwe shibala.
40025035	Lwekhuba ise naba intsala, inywe mwamba she khuulya; naba bulesa inywe mwamba she khuunywa; naba mukyeni, inywe mwantsakaanila muntsu tseenywe.
40025036	Ise naba bukhuna, inywe mwangwarisa; naba mulwale, mwandolelela bulayi; naba mu mapuusu, mweetsa mwambonakho.’
40025037	“Ne bakwalaafu nabo balimwiilamo bari, ‘Umukasya, khwakhubona liina nga uli ntsala khwakhuwa she khuulya; namwe nga uli bulesa khwakhuwa she khuunywa?
40025038	Khwakhubona liina nga uli umukyeni khwakhwakaanila iweefwe; namwe nga uli bukhuna khwakhukwarisa?
40025039	Khwakhubona liina nga uli umulwaale, namwe mu mapuusu, khweetsa khukhubona?’
40025040	Umuyinga naye alibelamo ari, ‘Ilala imbaboolela ndi, shoosi sheesi mwakholela mutweela khu bandaayase babafuura bukyeekhe bano, mwashikholela ise.’
40025041	“Lwanyuma aliloma ibo babaali khu mukhono kweewe kumunyeletsi ari, ‘Ni mururewo isi indi mutsye, inywe babatsubiwa, mutsye mu mulilo kukhasima ta, kukwaŋoonewaŋoonewa lwa Sitaani ni bamalayika beewe.
40025042	Lwekhuba ise naba intsala, ne inywe simwambakho she khuulya ta; naba bulesa, simwambakho she khuunywa ta.
40025043	Naba mukyeni, ne simwantsakaanila iweenywe ta; naba bukhuna, ne simwambakho bikwaaro ta; naba mulwale, lundi nga ndi mu mapuusu, simweetsa mwambonakho ta.’
40025044	Nabo balimwiilamo bari, ‘Umukasya, khwakhubona liina nga uli intsala, namwe bulesa, namwe umukyeni, namwe bukhuna, namwe mulwale, namwe mu mapuusu, ifwe khwalekha khukhuyeeta?’
40025045	“Naye alibelamo ari, ‘Ilala imbaboolela ndi, nga ni mukhashikholela mutweela khu bano babafuura bukyeekhe, muryo simwashikholela ise ta.’
40025046	Ni nabo baryo baliitsya mu shitaambiso shikhawawo ta, ne bakwalaafu baliitsya mu bulamu bubukhawawo ta.”
40026001	Lwanyuma nga Yesu wamalile khukanikha bilomo bino byoosi, waloma baleekelwa beewe ari,
40026002	“Mwamanyile nga lwanyuma lwe bifukhu bibili, Kamayiiya kakalaangibwa Kamayiiya ke Khubirakho katsya khubawo, n'Umwana w'Omundu aliweebwayo khumutsangilila khu musalaba.”
40026003	Lwanyuma basaayi bakhulu ni basakhulu be babandu babusanila atweela mu lwanyi lw'omusaayi ufuura bukhulu ulaangiwa Kayafa.
40026004	Ibweene iyo bekutila atweela isaambo yeesi kane bawambemo Yesu mu mbola busa bamwiire.
40026005	Ne baloma bonyene na bonyene bari, “Ne sishaakha khuuba khu bifukhu bye Kamayiiya ta, inyalikha khuubawo shisaayumba mu bandu.”
40026006	Ulwo Yesu n'aba nga ali i Besaniya mu ntsu ya Simoni uwe bikeenge,
40026007	abawo umukhasi uweetsa ni cupa iye kamafura kakawunya bulayi ke khukhwihakha, wakatsukha khu murwe kwa Yesu, nga Yesu wekhaale naalya.
40026008	Ne baleekelwa ni babona shino, bakhalala baloma bari, “Kamafura aka konekheele shiina?
40026009	Kamafura kano kandikulisiwilemo tsinusu tsingali busa tsiweebwa bataambi.”
40026010	Yesu n'abona aryo, wabareeba ari, “Lwashiina mwikiitsa umukhasi uyu? Wakholele ise shishindu shilayi naabi.
40026011	Lwekhuba bataambi kane mubaatsake ni nabo busheele, ne singene mubaatsake ni nase busheele taawe.
40026012	Umukhasi yuno n'antsukhilekho kamafura kano kakawunya bulayi khu mubili kwase, ashikholele khu khuŋoonaŋoona ise lwe khusiikhiwa khwase.
40026013	Ilala imbaboolela ndi, buli osi esi kamakhuwa kamalayi kano kane kaboolelwe mu shibala shoosi, ni nasho sheesi umukhasi yuno akholile balishilomakho lwe khumushebulila.”
40026014	Lwanyuma mutweela khwi khumi na babili ulaangiwa Yuda Isikalyoti, watsya isi basaayi bakhulu,
40026015	wabareeba ari, “Shiina sheesi kane muumbe ise ningene imbaaneyo Yesu isi muli?” Baryo bamubalila tsinusu tse ifeeza kamakhumi kataru bamuwa.
40026016	Ni khukhwama abweene awo, Yuda waba nga aweentsa imbuka indayi iye khumuwanayo isi bali.
40026017	Khu shifukhu shishinyoowa she Kamayiiya ke Kimikaati Kikikhasiila ta, baleekelwa beetsa isi Yesu bamureeba bari, “Kane khukhurekekhele ena esi ukana khuliila Kamayiiya ke Khubirakho?”
40026018	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Ni mutsye mu shiriimba w'omusaani mutweela, mumulome muri, ‘Umuleekeli aloma ari isaawa yase indobore yoolile. Nase ingana khuliila muntsu yoowo Kamayiiya ke Khubirakho ni baleekelwa baase.’ ”
40026019	Nabo baleekelwa baryo baatsya, bakhola nga Yesu n'abaloma, baŋoonaŋoona Kamayiiya ke Khubirakho.
40026020	Ne antsye ni bwelabula, Yesu ni baleekelwa beewe likhumi na babili, bekhala asi khuulya.
40026021	Ne ni baaba nga balya, Yesu wabaloma ari, “Ilala imbaboolela ndi, mutweela khwiinywe kane andyemo luwomelo.”
40026022	Baleekelwa boosi kumutaambo kwabawamba naabi, kila barakikha buli mutweela khuloma bari, “Umukasya, umanyisa ise?”
40026023	Yesu wabelamo ari, “Uyo ukhotsele ni nase musowani ndweela, niye unandyamo ise luwomelo.
40026024	Umwana w'Omundu kane atsye nga ni shamuronebwakho. Ne nga she kumutaambo isi uyo umulyamo luwomelo! Shandibeele shilayi aba nga ukhasaalikha ta.”
40026025	Lwanyuma Yuda abe uwe khumulyamo luwomelo wamuloma ari, “Umuleekeli, niye ise?” Yesu wamwiilamo ari, “Ee, niye iwe nga n'ulomele.”
40026026	Baryo ni baaba nga balya, Yesu wabukula kumukaati, wakuloombela ikhabi, wakumenyulamo, wakuwa baleekelwa beewe, nga aloma ari, “Ni mubukule mulye, kuno nikwo kumubili kwase.”
40026027	Lwanyuma wabukula shikhopo, washiloombela ikhabi, washibawa nga aloma ari, “Ni munywekho khu shino mweesi.
40026028	Lwekhuba kano niko kamafuki kaase, kakaŋaŋasa indakaano ya Wele, kakatsutsukha lwe bakali, lwe khukhwiyakhila bibyonako.
40026029	Imbaboolela ndi, ise s'indinywakho lundi khu byaano bye kumusabibu bino, khukhwama shaleelo, khukhwoolesa khu shifukhu isho khweesi indinyweelakho bushaakha ni nanywe mu Buyinga bwa Papa wase.”
40026030	Baryo ni baamala khukhweemba kumweenya, barura baatsya khu lukiingi lwa Zeyituuni.
40026031	Lwanyuma Yesu waloma baleekelwa beewe ari, “Inywe mweesi shiilo shino kane mukhasikhane khulwase, lwekhuba sharonebwa shiri; ‘Indikhupa umwaayi we kamasheese, ni kamasheese ke mwitaala koosi kalisalanila.’
40026032	Ne lwanyuma nindimala khulamusibwa, indibanyoowa ibweeni khuutsya i Galilaaya.”
40026033	Kila Petero wamwiilamo ari, “Bano boosi bakhakhasikha khu lwoowo, ise singene ishikhole na khakyeekhe khoosi ta.”
40026034	Ne Yesu wamuloma ari, “Ilala ikhuboolela ndi, mu shilo sheene shino, itwaya inaba nga ishiili khukholyookha ta, iwe kane ube wantsikaanile kimilundi kitaru uri, wakhumamanya ise ta.”
40026035	Ne Petero welamo ari, “Ikhaba nga kane shibe she khufwila atweela ni nawe, singene ikhwikaanekho na khakyeekhe khoosi ta.” Ni baleekelwa babandi nabo boosi baloma baryo.
40026036	Lwanyuma Yesu watsya ni baleekelwa beewe mu shiifwo shishilaangibwa Getesemane, wabaloma ari, “Ni mwikhalekho ano, nga ise niintsyakho iyo khuloomba.”
40026037	Warobolamo Petero, ni babaana ba Zebedaayo, watsya ni nabo, warakikha khukhwiyembelela naabi, kumutaambo kwamuwamba.
40026038	Lwanyuma wabaloma ari, “Kumwoyo kwase kwetsuule bibyambaaso bye kumutaambo kukuntsolesa ni khuufwa. Ni muramekho ano, ne mube nga muli meeso ni nase.”
40026039	Aryo wamawo watsyakho aburangisikho khafwiiti, wakwa asi mafumala, waloomba ari, “Wo Papa wase, noola shinyalikha, khayo shikhopo shino she butsiina shindusiwekho. Ne akhuba nga ise ni ngana ta, ne nga iwe n'ukana.”
40026040	Lwanyuma wakobolayo isi baleekelwa beewe, wabanyoola nga bakonele liilo. Waloma Petero ari, “Inywe simunyalile khuuba meeso ni nase khumalakho isaawa ndweela yonyene ta?
40026041	Ni mube meeso, lundi muloombe, nio mulekhe khukwa mu khukhonjelesebwa ta. Kumwoyo ilala kukana, ne kumubili nikwo kumutoro.”
40026042	Yesu welayo lundi kumulundi kwe khabili, waloomba ari, “Wo Papa, noola sishinyalikha shikhopo shino she butsiina khukhundusibwakho ta, khurusakho nga nashinyweele, sheesi iwe ukana shikholekhe.”
40026043	Aryo n'akobola lundi isi baleekelwa beewe, wabanyoola ndi nga bakona liilo, lwekhuba tsimoni tsaawe tsaba tsasitowele.
40026044	Aryo wabalekha, welayo lundi waloomba kumulundi kwe khataru nga aloma bilomo byeene nibyo bitweela nga bikiboole.
40026045	Lwanyuma wakobola isi baleekelwa beewe, wabaloma ari, “Mushikona lundi mushiwola? Bona ari isaawa yoolile, n'Umwana w'Omundu ari wawanibwileyo mu mikhono kye babonaki.
40026046	Ari ni mwinyukhe khutsye! Bona uyo unandyamo luwomelo ali ambi khukhwoola.”
40026047	Ne Yesu n'aba nga ashikanikha aryo, mutweela khu baleekelwa beewe likhumi na babili ulaangiwa Yuda woola, nga ali ni lituuli lye babandu bakali nga bali ni tsindima, ni tsisoonyi, baaba barumaniwile ni basaayi bakhulu ni basakhulu be babandu.
40026048	Ari uyo uwamulyamo luwomelo aba wabaweele khabonelo nga aloma ari, “Uyo yeesi kane ingwe mu shifuba, aba niye umweene uyo, mumuwambe.”
40026049	Aryo Yuda weetsa burereefu isi Yesu, wamuloma ari, “Umuleekeli, mulembe!” Wamukwa mu shifuba.
40026050	Yesu wamuloma ari, “Musaale, khola sheesi witsiliile khukhola.” Baryo basaani beetsa baakwa khu Yesu bamuwamba.
40026051	Ne bona mutweela khuubo babaaba ni Yesu winyusa kumukhono, wasowoolayo lurima lweewe, warema umukulwa w'omusaayi ufuura bukhulu, wamukhalakho khukhuru.
40026052	Yesu wamuloma ari, “Yisayo lurima lwoowo mu shiifwo shalwo, lwekhuba ibo boosi babasowoolayo lurima, balihela ni lurima.
40026053	Inywe mwambaasa muri, ise shinyala khukhwikontselela Papa, ni naye khangukho anyala khukhuntsakaanisa kamahe ke bamalayika kakaminyisa khwi khumi na kabili?
40026054	Ni bibyaronebwa bikhosefu binyala byoolelela biryeena, bibiloma biri shino shaakha shibe shiryo?”
40026055	Mu saawa nyene iyo, Yesu waloma lituuli lilyeetsa ari, “Inywe muli nga babetsiliile umunuuli ni tsindima ni tsisoonyi khukhumaamba ise? Ne busheele nekhalatsaka mu Lisaayilo Likhulu, nga indeekela, ne nga simwamamba ta.
40026056	Ne bino byoosi byakholikhile nio bibyaronebwa bye baŋoosi byoolele.” Ne baleekelwa beewe boosi batitukha bamulekha.
40026057	Ibo babawamba Yesu bamuyila w'omusaayi ufuura bukhulu, ulaangiwa Kayafa, ibweene iyo yeesi baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa, ni basakhulu baaba babusaniile.
40026058	Ne Petero wamuloondakho inyuma aleeyikho, khukhwoolela ilala mu lwanyi lw'omusaayi ufuura bukhulu, naye wenjila mukari, wekhala atweela ni baliindi, ari nio abone bibyaamamo.
40026059	Basaayi bakhulu nibe mu lukhobo boosi bakhakakho khuweentsa bujulisi bwe bubeeyi khu Yesu nio banyalise khumwiira.
40026060	Ne balekha khunyoola ta, ikhaba nga abawo bajulisi bakali bebubeeyi babeetsa. Ne ibumaliliso, abawo babili babeetsa,
40026061	baloma bari, “Umundu yuno aloma ari, ‘Ise inyala khusaambula lisaayilo lino likhulu lya Wele, lundi nalyombekhela mu bifukhu bitaru.’ ”
40026062	Umusaayi ufuura bukhulu wenyukha weema khu ngaaki, waloma Yesu ari, “Iwe s'uli ni she khukhwiilamo ta? Lomo shiina yeesi basaani bano bareera khukhutsuntsumilisa iwe?”
40026063	Ne Yesu wasila busa. Umusaayi ufuura bukhulu kila amuloma lundi ari, “Ikhulomela ni shishitsubo mu Wele Umulamu, n'ukhuboolele noola iwe Kristo, Umwana wa Wele?”
40026064	Yesu wamwiilamo ari, “Ee, shiili nga iwe n'ulomele. Ne imbaboolela inywe mweesi ndi khukhwama shaleelo shino, mulibona Umwana w'Omundu nga wekhaale khu mukhono kumulayi kw'Omunyali wa byoosi, lundi nga etsila khu namufweeli we mwikulu.”
40026065	Lwanyuma umusaayi ufuura bukhulu winuulaka bikwaaro byeewe nga aloma ari, “Oyu wakhomele Wele, ari khukanila shiina bujulisi bubuundi? Bona ari mwawuliile bukholomi bweewe.
40026066	Ari inywe mwambaasa muryeena?” Nabo belamo bari, “Akhila khuufwa.”
40026067	Lwanyuma bamufuutsila kamare mu moni, bamukhupa bifuusi, babandi bamukhupa tsiimbi,
40026068	nga bamuloma bari, “N'ukhulakule, iwe Kristo. Naanu niye ukhupile?”
40026069	Khu mbuka yino Petero aba wekhaale ibulafu mu lwanyi. Abawo umwakaanisi umukhaana weetsa is'ali, wamuloma ari, “Ni nawe waba ni Yesu umu Galilaaya.”
40026070	Ne Petero niye wekaanila mu moni tse babandu boosi nga aloma ari, “Ise nakhumanyakho sheesi iwe uli khukanikhakho ta!”
40026071	Ne Petero n'arura khukhwoola mu mulyango, umukhaana ukuundi umwakaanisi wamubona, walomela babandu ari, “Umusaani uyu naye aba atweela ni Yesu we Nazareesi.”
40026072	Petero wekaana lundi nga etsuba, waloma ari, “Umusaani uyo ise simumanyakho ta!”
40026073	Lwanyumakho lundi, ibo babaaba bemile awo beetsa isi Petero, bamuloma bari, “Ilala iwe uli mutweela khu nibo, lwekhuba isaambo yeesi ukanikhamo ikhwokyesanisa.”
40026074	Ulwo Petero warakikha khukhwoona ni khukhwitsuba, nga aloma ari, “Umusaani uyo ise simumanyakho ta.” Ni khangukho, itwaya yakholookha.
40026075	Ni abweene awo, Petero washebulila byeesi Yesu amuloma ari, “Itwaaya inaba nga ishiili khukholyookha ta, iwe kane untsikaane kimilundi kitaru.” Aryo, warura ibulafu, walila naabi kamasika.
40027001	Kumutikhinyi mu mamilimili, basaayi bakhulu boosi ni basakhulu be babandu, bakhalilawo atweela bye khukhwiira Yesu.
40027002	Baryo bamubowa, bamuyila, bamuwanayo isi Pilato, uwaba gafana.
40027003	Lwanyuma lwayo, Yuda uwalya mu Yesu luwomelo, n'abona nga bakhalile Yesu kumusaango kwe khufwa, kumutaambo kwamuwamba, wakobosela basaayi bakhulu ni basakhulu tsinusu tsana kamakhumi kataru.
40027004	Waloma ari, “Ise nonakile, lwekhuba naliilemo luwomelo umundu ukhalikho ni kumusaango ta.” Nabo bamwiilamo bari, “Ikwo musaango kweefwe? Ikwo musaango kwoowo.”
40027005	Lwanyuma Yuda watuuma tsinusu tsana mu Lisaayilo Likhulu, warura watsya wekoka.
40027006	Basaayi bakhulu babukula tsinusu itso, baloma bari, “Shili she kumusilo khubukula tsinusu tsino khwatsira atweela ni biwanwa mwibikhilo lye Lisaayilo Likhulu, lwekhuba tsili tsinusu tse kamafuki.”
40027007	Ni nashiryo bakhalilawo atweela, batsikulamo kumukuunda kw'omubuumbi mweesi baasiikhatsakamo bakyeni.
40027008	Isho nisho shishikila kumukuundakwo kwalaangiwa kuri, kumukuunda kwe kamafuki, khukhwoolesa ni shaleelo.
40027009	Shino sholelesa ibyo bibyalomewa n'Umuŋoosi Yeremiya shiri, “Babukula tsinusu itso kamakhumi kataru, bukusi bw'oyo bweesi babaana ba Isiraeli balala bafukiilisana khuwayo khulweewe,
40027010	batsiraambisa khutsikulamo kumukuunda kw'omubuumbi nga esi Umukasya andakila ise.”
40027011	Nga bili biryo, Yesu wemikha mu moni tsa gafana, naye gafana wamureeba ari, “Iwe niye umuyinga we Bayudaaya?” Yesu naye wamwiilamo ari, “Ee, shili nga iwe n'ulomele.”
40027012	Ne mwiibyo byeesi basaayi bakhulu ni basakhulu bamuwabila, mbaawo sheesi elamo ta.
40027013	Lwanyuma Pilato wamureeba ari, “Iwe s'uwulila bilomo bino byoosi byeesi bano bakhutsuntsumilisa ta?”
40027014	Ne Yesu walekha khubakho ni she khukhwiilamo ta, ikhaba na shitweela ta, khukhwolesa ni gafana naye weyaanga naabi.
40027015	Ne buli mwiiko gafana abatsaka ni saambo iye khukangululila babandu umubowe mutweela yeesi bakanatsaka alekhuulibwe khu shifukhu she Kamayiiya ke Khubirakho.
40027016	Ne khu mbuka iyo, babaayo n'umubowe uwamanyikhana naabi lwe buubi bweewe, uwalaangiwa Baraba.
40027017	Awo boosi ni babusana, Pilato wabareeba ari, “Naanu yeesi mukana imbalekhuulile; Baraba namwe Yesu ulaangibwa Kristo?”
40027018	Lwekhuba amanya ari lyaba libuba lilyakila bawanayo Yesu isi niye.
40027019	Ne Pilato ni ekhala khu shitsoloŋo she khukhala kimisaango, umukhasi weewe wamurumanila burume ari, “Ukhakholakho shishindu shoosi khu musaani uyo ukhalikho shiibi shoosi ta, lwekhuba nataambisiwile naabi mu marooro mu shilo khulweewe.”
40027020	Ne basaayi bakhulu ni basakhulu bakhonjelesa babandu bari baloombe Pilato abalekhuulile Baraba, ne biire Yesu.
40027021	Gafana wabareeba lundi ari, “Khu babandu bano babili, mukana imbalekhuulile naanu?” Nabo belamo bari, “Baraba!”
40027022	Kila ndi Pilato wabareeba ari, “Ne Yesu ulaangiwa Kristo, imukhole ndyeena?” Boosi belamo bari, “Mutsangilile khu musalaba!”
40027023	Pilato wabareeba lundi ari, “Ne lwashiina? Shiibi shiina sheesi akholile?” Ne nabo belamo ni kamaani koosi bari, “Mutsangilile khu musalaba!”
40027024	Ne Pilato n'abona nga bahandalale naabi, bakana khusoolana busoolani, wabukula kameetsi, wasaaba kamakhono keewe mu moni tse babandu boosi nga babona, nga aloma ari, “Ise sindikho ni kumusaango kwoosi lwe kamafuki k'omusaani yuno ta, ukwo musaango kweenywe!”
40027025	Ne babandu boosi belamo bari, “Kha kumusaango kwe kamafuki keewe kube khwiifwe ni khu baana beefwe!”
40027026	Aryo Pilato wabalekhuulila Baraba, ne walakila ari Yesu bamukhupe tsimiimbo, lwanyuma wamuwanayo isi bali bamutsangilile khu musalaba.
40027027	Lwanyuma basilikhale ba Gafana bayila Yesu khu lwanyi lwe kimisaango, babunisa lituuli lye basilikhale boosi khumwibotokhelela.
40027028	Baryo bamwabulamo tsingubo tseewe, bamukwaarisa ingubo imbesemu.
40027029	Balukha liyabi lye kamawa, balimukwarisa khu murwe kweewe, bamura imiimbo mu mukhono kweewe kumulayi. Lwanyuma bafukhama asi iburangisi weewe, bamwoonela bari, “Mulembe iwe umuyinga we Bayudaaya!”
40027030	Baryo bamufuutsila kamare, bamurusakho imiimbo isi baara mu mukhono kweewe, bamukhupa khu murwe kimilundi mikali.
40027031	Ne ni baamala khumwoonela baryo, bamwabulamo ingubo tsana imbesemu, bamukwaarisa bikwaaro byeewe bibyeene. Lwanyuma bamuyila khumutsangilila khu musalaba.
40027032	Ne ni baaba nga barura ibulafu, bakanana umusaani uwe Kurene, uwalaangiwa Simoni; bamuwanyiinya khusuta kumusalaba kwa Yesu.
40027033	Baryo boola mu shiifwo shishilaangibwa bari Gologosa (kamakhulu kaasho bari shiifwo she shiwanga).
40027034	Abweene awo baawa Yesu iviini khuunywa, nga bakitubaasilemo indule naabi, na namuusakho, wekaana khukinywa.
40027035	Ne ni baamala khumutsangilila khu musalaba, bakabanana bikwaaro byeewe, nga bakhupa khakokha
40027036	Lwanyuma lwayo, bekhala awo khumulolelela.
40027037	Ne angaaki e kumurwe kweewe barawo burone bubuloma buri, OYUNO NIYE UMUYINGA WE BAYUDAAYA.
40027038	Abawo ni banuuli babili babatsangililwa ni naye, mutweela khu mukhono kweewe kumulayi, n'ukuundi khu mukhono kweewe kumunyeletsi.
40027039	Babandu boosi babaaba babirawo, bamwoonela nga basisiikha kimirwe kyaawe.
40027040	nga baloma bari, “Iwe abe unyala khusaambula Lisaayilo Likhulu, walyombekhela lundi mu bifukhu bitaru, yiwonesa wamweene khubone! Ari yiikha urure khu musalaba khubone, noola uli Umwana wa Wele!”
40027041	Ni musaambo niyo ndweela basaayi bakhulu nabo, ni baleekeli be kamakambila ka Musa, ni basakhulu nabo, bamwoonela nga baloma bari,
40027042	“Awonesatsaka babandi, ne bona s'anyala wewonesa umweene ta! Mbo niye umuyinga wa Isiraeli, ari ni eekhe khukhwama khu musalaba, ni nafwe kane khumufukiilile.
40027043	Mbo niye eyikina Wele, ari lekha Wele amuwonese noola namukana, lwekhuba niye aloma ari, niye ali Umwaana wa Wele.”
40027044	Ni musaambo niyo ndweela, banuuli ibo babatsangililwa ni naye atweela nabo bamwoonela naabi.
40027045	Khukhwama khu saawa iye khasesaba tse mwihangilwe, khukhwoola khu saawa iye shisheenda, shishiilima shikali shaakwa khu shibala shoosi.
40027046	Ne khu saawa awo nga sheenda, Yesu walila ni likono lye angaaki nga aloma ari, “Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani?” (Kamakhulu kaasho kari, “Wele wase, Wele wase, lwashiina undekhele?”)
40027047	Batweela khu bandu babaaba bemile awo ni bawulila baryo, baloma bari, “Bona ari alaanga Eliya.”
40027048	Lubaluba mutweela khu nibo watimaka, wabukula shishaangwe, washitsukhamo iviini indule naabi, washira khu lukholo, washira imunwa wa Yesu ari anywe.
40027049	Ne babaramile boosi baloma bari, “N'umulekhe abe. Ari khakhuliinde khubone noola Eliya kane etse amuwonese.”
40027050	Ne lwanyuma nga Yesu waliliile angaaki ni likono likali, walekhuula kumwoyo kweewe.
40027051	Khu mbuka nyene iyo, ingubo iyaba yatiimbibwa mu Lisaayilo Likhulu, yonuukhamo kimilundi kibili, khukhwama khu ngaaki khukhwoola asi. Shibala shoosi shanikina, ni kamabaale kaatikhakamo.
40027052	Tsiŋani tsabalukhaka, ni kimibili kye babandu bakhosefu babaafwa khaale kyalamusibwa.
40027053	Ne ni bamala khurura mu ŋani lwanyuma lwe khulamukha khwa Yesu, baatsya mu shiriimba shikhosefu, babonekhela babandu bakali.
40027054	Umusilikhale umukhulu ni babandi babaaba baliindile Yesu, ni baabona khunikina khwe shibala, ni bibindi bibyakholekha, baarya naabi, baloma bari, “Ilala umusaani yuno abeele Umwana wa Wele.”
40027055	Bakhasi bakali babaaba nga bemile aleeyikho, balolelela bibyakholekha byoosi. Nibo babaloondelelatsaka Yesu khukhwama i Galilaaya, nga bamwakaanisa.
40027056	Mu nibo mwabamo Mariya Magadalena, Mariya Maayi wa Yakobo ni Yosefu, ni maayi we babaana ba Zebedaayo.
40027057	Ne antsye ni bwaba nga bwilabula, abawo umusaani umuyindifu uweetsa khukhwama i Alimaseya, lisiina lyeewe bari Yosefu, naye uwaba wayikela umuleekelwa wa Yesu.
40027058	Nga watsiile isi Pilato, wamuloomba amuwe kumulaambo kwa Yesu. Ni Pilato walakila ari bakumuwe.
40027059	Aryo Yosefu wayila kumulaambo, wakubowa mu ngubo, imiliwu iwanga imelamela.
40027060	Wakwalisa mu ŋani yeewe umweene imbya yeesi ayaba mu lwanda. Wayilingisa libaale liboofu, walira khu mulyaango kwe ŋani, warurawo watsya.
40027061	Mariya Magadalena ni Mariya ukuundi baaba bekhaale mu shiifwo shishilolelaniile ni ŋani.
40027062	Khu shifukhu shishelakho, nisho shifukhu shishiila khu she khukhwiŋoonaŋoona, basaayi bakhulu ni Bafarisaayo babusana isi Pilato, bamuloma bari,
40027063	“Musakhulu, ifwe khushebulila nga umubeeyi yuno ashiili mulamu aloma ari, ‘Lwanyuma lwe bifukhu bitaru, indilamukha mu bafu.’
40027064	Nashiryo, lakila baliindiile ilala ŋani, khukhwolesa khu shifukhu she khataru. Manya lukana baleekelwa beewe banyala beetsa beeba kumulaambo kweewe, lwanyuma baboolela babandu bari walamusiwile mu bafu. Ni khuwoombesa khuno khwe lwanyuma kane khube khuubi naabi khufuurisa khuukiboole.”
40027065	Aryo Pilato waloma ari, “Mbo muli ni baliindi basilikhale, ni mutsye muliindile ilala iŋani nga ni munyala.”
40027066	Nabo baryo baatsya, baliindila ilala iŋani, barakho ni khabonelo khu libaale, lundi barakho ni baliindi.
40028001	Lwanyuma lwa Sabato, bwaba kumutikhinyi mu mamilimili khu shifukhu shishinyoowa mu sabiiti, Mariya Magadalena, ni Mariya ukuundi tsana, baatsya khubona iŋani.
40028002	Abawo khunikina khukali khwe shibala, lwekhuba malayika w'Omukasya ekha khukhwama mwikulu, weetsa khu ŋani wayilingisa libaale, walikhalakho.
40028003	Imbonekha yeewe yaba nga khumulikha khwe kamaani, ni bikwaaro byeewe byaba byakhosa nga kamararara.
40028004	Baliindi baarya naabi lwa malayika yuno, banikina bafwana nga babafwiile.
40028005	Malayika waloma bakhasi ari, “Mukharya ta, lwekhuba namanyile ndi, mulikho muweentsa Yesu uwatsaangililwa khu musalaba.
40028006	Ne s'ali ano ta, walamukhile nga n'aloma. Ni mwiitse mubone esi alisibwa.
40028007	Nio ari mutsye khaangu muboolele baleekelwa beewe muri, ‘Walamukhile mu bafu, ne bona wabaraangilile khuutsya i Galilaaya. Ibweene iyo niyo yeesi mulimubonela.’ Bona ari nababooleele.”
40028008	Baryo bakhasi barura khaangu khu ŋani nga bariire naabi, ne nga betsuule kumwikhoyo mukali, batima baatsya khuboolela baleekelwa beewe.
40028009	Khaangukho Yesu umweene wabakanana, wabaloma ari, “Mulembe.” Bamwiitsayo, bamutiila khu bikyele, lundi bamwisaaya.
40028010	Lwanyuma Yesu wabaloma ari, “Mukharya ta. Ni mutsye muboolele bayaaya baase, batsye i Galilaaya, ibweene iyo niyo yeesi balimbonela.”
40028011	Bakhasi ni baaba nga batsya, batweela khu baliindi baatsya mu shiriimba, baboolela basaayi bakhulu ibyo byoosi bibyaba byabelewo.
40028012	Baryo ni babusana atweela ni basakhulu bakhala kamakyesi, baawa basilikhale tsinusu tsingali,
40028013	nga babaloma bari, “Muloma muri, ‘Baleekelwa beewe beetsile mu shilo nga ifwe khwakonele, bamwiiba.’
40028014	Lwekhuba kamakhuwa kano ni kalyoola wa gafana, ifwe khulimuwooyawooya, mulekhe khukwa mu bukosi bwoosi ta.”
40028015	Baryo baliindi bayila tsinusu, bakhola nga ni babalakila. Kamakhuwa kano kasalanila mu Bayudaaya boosi, ni khukhwoolesa shaleelo.
40028016	Baryo baleekelwa likhumi na mutweela baatsya i Galilaaya khu lukiingi lweesi Yesu abaloma khuutsyakho.
40028017	Ne ni bamubona, bamwisaaya, ne babandi bamwikanakana.
40028018	Lwanyuma Yesu weetsa isi bali, wabaloma ari, “Ise nawebwile bunyala bwoosi, mwikulu ni khu shibala.
40028019	Nashiryo, ni mutsye mukaluse kamanaambo koosi mukekyelise baleekelwa, nga mubabatisa mu Lisiina lya Papa nily'Omwana, nily'Omwoyo Umukhosefu.
40028020	Nga mubaleekela khuwamba byoosi byeesi nabalakila inywe. Mwilala, nase ndi atweela ni nanywe, bifukhu byoosi khukhwoolesa khu ntsakamo iye kumuboolo.”
41001001	Khuno nikhwo khurakikha khwe Kamakhuwa Kamalayi, kakawamba khu Yesu Kristo, Umwana wa Wele.
41001002	Kaarakikha nga ni shanyoowa khuronebwa mu shitabo sha Yisaaya umuŋoosi shiri, “Bona, ise indirumana umurume wase, ukhakhunyoowe iwe ibweeni woowo, khukhuŋoonaŋoonela iwe intsila yoowo.
41001003	Iliyo likono ly'oyo ukukuulila angaaki mu mubiimbi ari, ‘Ni muŋoone kumukhoosi kw'Omukasya nalundi ni mukwalaase tsintsila tseesi atsya khukyendelakho.’ ”
41001004	Yohana Umubatisa abonekhela mu mubiimbi nga abatisa babandu, nalundi nga akukuula ari babandu bafune khubatisibwa khwe khukhwibiyisa bibyonako nio akile beyakhilwe bibyonako byaabwe.
41001005	Kila babandu bakali khukhwama mu Buyudaaya ni khukhwama mu shiriimba she Yerusalemu, baatsya khurekeeresa byeesi Yohana aba nga aloma. Nga beetsile isi Yohana, bebiiyisa bibyonako byabwe, aryo naye wababatisila mu luutsi Yorudaani.
41001006	Yohana Umubatisa akwaaratsaka tsingubo tseesi baanaba khukhwama mu bwoya bwe ingamya, nalundi abe ebowa lukhoba mu shibuno. Biilyo byeewe byaba tsisike ni bubuushi bwe intsukhi iye mwirome.
41001007	Yohana akukuula burume bweewe nga aloma ari, “Iliyo umundu uli khukhwiitsa inyuma wase, uli uwe angaaki khukhuminyisakho ise. Ni nase sinakhila khukhwinama asi nakangulula lukhoba lwe bilaalo byeewe ta.
41001008	Ise imbabatisa inywe ni kameetsi, ne uyo niye alibabatisa inywe n'Umwoyo Umukhosefu.”
41001009	Mu bifukhu byeene ibyo, Yesu wetsa nga ama mu shisiintsa she Nazareesi, shishaba mu Galilaaya. Yohana Umubatisa wamubatisila mu luutsi Yorudaani.
41001010	Khaangukho Yesu n'ama mu meetsi, wabona likulu nga lyabayuukhile, n'Umwoyo Umukhosefu nga afwana nga liwuusi, nga amwikhakho.
41001011	Likono lyarura mwikulu nga liloma liri, “Iwe niye Umwana wase yeesi ise ingana naabi. Ise ikhwikhoyela iwe naabi.”
41001012	Kamaani k'Omwoyo Umukhosefu kakila waatsya mu mu mubiimbi.
41001013	Wamenya mu mubiimbi khumala bifukhu kamakhumi kane, nga Sitaani amukhakilisa; wabaatsaka ni tsisolo tse mwirome, ni bamalayika baaba nga bamuyeetatsaka.
41001014	Lwanyuma nga bamalile khuwamba Yohana Umubatisa ni khumubowa mu mapuusu, Yesu watsya i Galilaaya nga aleekela babandu kamakhuwa kamalayi, kakaama isi Wele,
41001015	nga aloma ari, “Isaawa inyene yoolele, ni Buyinga bwa Wele bwolile ambi. Ni mwibiyise bibyonako byenywe, nalundi mufukiilile Kamakhuwa Kamalayi.”
41001016	Yesu n'aba nga abira khu ndulo khwe inyaantsa isi balaanga bari Galilaaya, wabona Simoni ni yaaya weewe Andereya. Baaba balikho baraambisa butiimba khuwamba tsinyeeni, khulwekhuba baaba balobi be tsinyeeni.
41001017	Kila Yesu abaloma ari, “Ni mwiitse munondelele ise, ni nase indibakalusa mwikyele babareera babandu isi ise indi.”
41001018	Khaangukho balekha butiimba bwaabwe, baloondelela Yesu.
